name: The One Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm and Sweet Gourmand.Key Notes:Amber, Jasmine, Peach, Vanilla.Fragrance Description:Sensuous and timeless, The One Eau de Parfum is the essence of the DOLCE&GABBANA woman. This floral fragrance combines contemporary fruit ingredients with the perfumeru2018s classic palette of white flowers. The scent opens with sparkling bergamot and mandarin blended with notes of lychee and peach. Heart notes of Madonna lily express a voluptuous intensity and enveloping femininity followed by the seductive dry-down of vanilla, amber, and musk.
ingredients: Alcohol, Fragrance, Water, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Linalool, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Isoeugenol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Bht, Ci 15985 (Yellow 6), Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

I bought this perfume on recommendation of a friend. It was a great purchase. I love it. The scent isn't cloying, sweet, or standoffishly strong. It's warm and soft, but the dry down is amazing too. You can actually smell it's transitions. I love that. Worth the cost. I would wear it any season.

I've been wearing this perfume for 8 years now -- I've tried new ones every year and nothing compares. It's subtle and sexy, now my signature scent! But with any perfume, you should go into a store and try it on before you buy :)

I love perfume. I started with a sample and couldn't get enough. The amber and vanilla make it more sweet than floral on me which I can appreciate. It kind of reminds me of a beach, which makes it perfect for summer. Can't say enough good things about this perfume. It even lasts all day!

While I know all perfumes smell different on different people. On ME this makes me smell like the bottom of an old ladies purse. One who smokes and has tobacco covered mints in the bottom. It has a interesting leathery smell on me, slightly woody, but then that wood smell warps into something that smells like fresh cut tobacco. And I don't smoke.  On others is smells gorgeous, on me? I smell like a woman named Mable with a nice leather handbag.

I have about 30 perfumes but NONE of them come remotely  close to being my holy grail as much as The One (some come in at a distant second) To me, cologne and perfume are about evoking feelings, not just smells. None of my other perfumes make me feel like The One does. I feel, strong, professional, but surprisingly feminine and ethereal...like some kind of galactic high elf, if that makes sense... when i wear this. Basically, I feel like a woman who is actually adult-y (I'm told i don't look my age and my personality is a bit kooky) This is my most complimented fragrance by men. Women like it but I get complimented 3 or 4 times more by my male coworkers. Whether I'm wearing The One alone, or on top of another perfume, OR on top of a male fragrance, i ALWAYS receive at least one or two compliments on it.  Although it's not the most unique scent, or the strongest in my collection, there's just something about the sweet subtlety in this scent that really captivates my guy friends/coworkers, and me as well.  I read that fragrance is extremely personal, and based on what i smell on my own skin and what other people smell, I can safely say that this *luckily* works perfectly with my natural chemistry, which I'm so happy about. Most of my female coworkers splash on overly sweet or fruity scenes that stink up the break room for the first 2-5 minutes then completely disappear, and despite this, I'm the one who has become known for always smelling really good every day. I have no doubt that The One had a large chunk in that. Within a month or two of buying the smaller bottle, i went out and got the largest size as a back up. I know i will continue to wear this for a very, very long time.
This was a gift from my daughter, I love it!!! I use to wear Code until they changed the scent. This is my new FAV!!!
This is my signature scent, will buy 'til I die!!!

Okay I never review anything but I have to make an exception for this. This perfume is hands down the best perfume ever, its very mature, unique, and doesn't smell like any other perfume. I will buy it until I die, lol. I don't know why some people are saying it doesn't last long because it last up to 3 days on me especially when I spray on my clothes.

Love! Warm & sensual! Goes on strong but soon dies down to a whisper soft & sensual smell. Chloe by chloe is my all time favorite so this is very different for me, but to my surprise I am in love with this. Kind of reminds me of a modern day Tresor by lancome which I loved back in the day:)

reviews.review_title: This is my go to perfume
reviews.review_text: I'm on my 3rd bottle of this, I love trying new perfumes, but The One is my favorite. I always receive compliments whenever I wear it.
Loved it on other people, but for some reason it's too strong on me. Would recommend to others though!

reviews.review_title: Loved it but it disappeared so fast
reviews.review_text: Love love loved this smell.  Really was planning to purchase a roller ball or even a big size, but decided to wait and see how it wore--you know how they say you have to let a fragrance mix with your chemistry to see how it will really smell on you. Boy was I glad I waited. I tried it on and went about my business. It lost its pungency almost right away.  After an hour, it was a faint, sweet smell. Then later on it was pretty much gone.  Bummer. I liked it but am not going to pay this price for perfume that dries to smell like a cheap body spray type fragrance.

As much as I've ordered I have many, many sample of perfumes and many of them smell wonderful. I wanted to buy a full size and it was hard at the time I had over 50 samples, now I couldn't count them all. I bought The One in the 1.6 oz it has a soft scent yet stays on all day. The first time I wore this perfume I was asked by a couple of friends what I was wearing. Normally I may squirt 2-3 pumps and it last from daylight to dark even going into the next morning. Try a sample at your local Sephora store or if available in the pick 3 samples try it, you'll love the soft long lasting scent that's not too overwhelming yet stays smelling great up to 24hrs or more. One of my favorite picks <3 (heart) symbol.

It's expensive, but with good reason.  Probably my most favorite perfume. It's got a little bit of everything-- warm florals, light musk, warm vanilla, slight jasmine, even very slight pepper notes. It lingers and stays on me all day. I have purchased like, 3 of the largest bottles. Definitely my fave smell!
I received a sample and loved it so much that I ordered the rollerball. I have received compliments. My only negative is that it is way too expensive.

I got a sample size of this from Sephora about a year ago and completely fell in love and had to buy a bottle!!! Such a wonderful scent I don't even know how to describe it! It's my favorite everyday perfume and is so delicious smelling! I always get compliments when I wear this perfume!

This scent makes me feel sophisticated but modern and sexy at the same time. It's an addicting smell and it last a really long time on the skin (and clothing) as compared to many fragrances that disappear within a few hours. I'm on my second big bottle and don't ever see being without this perfume. It's my go to scent!
I love this perfume! It's got a bit of old glamour, it's great for a black dress and pearls.

I bought the eau de toilette as my first REAL perfume around 5 years ago. Then I once hugged my boyfriend and when he went home he told me that my fragrance was still staying in his clothes. What can I say, this fragrance last so long, it smells fantastic and you won't find this kinda smell in other fragrances. and also it smells expensive!
Smells amazing all day long I get so many compliments it's not over powering and super feminine!!!
One of my favorite scents. Wish it would last longer, but other than that it's perfect.
D&G, you've done it again. This scent is so sexy. What more can I say??!!

I was gifted one of those cute roller ball gift sets and instantly fell in love with The One. I immediately went to the Sephora store to buy a full size bottle!  It smells light, feminine and floral. I wish that it lasted a bit longer but I just carry the roller ball version for easy re-application.

One spray of this was enough to make the bathroom stink for three days.  I sprayed it on myself once to test it (I got a large sample with my purchase) and even after washing it off, I could still smell it for the rest of the day.  My boyfriend had a headache for a day after all of this.  One spray.  If you like something that people can smell you coming 40 feet away, this is your fragrance.
Heaven in a bottle. I don't know how I ever went without this scent before discovering it!

This was one of the 1st perfumes I bought when I first became a fragrance junkie and it's been one of my favs ever , a little goes a long way and I can smell it on me but it isn't overbearing or load at all it's a very nice scent and will continue to buy as long as it's available
LOVE LOVE LOVE and perfect for purse n travel
This sent has been absolutely irresistible to every man I've worn it around!

I like to try out new perfumes but cannot stop myself from going back to this one. Cannot be without it. It has a beautiful musky smell, probably more of an evening scent but can definitely get away with it in any situation.

reviews.review_title: smells heavenly but is very light
reviews.review_text: Over the last week I've ordered samples online which just came today and been to three stores to sample fragrances. This one smells the best. Sexy, Classy, Heavenly. Not too musky and I'm sensitive to musk. Very light. Getting it is the spray bottle it a must so you can really get it on generously quick as you will be reapplying at least every couple hours.

Oh man, what can I say? Itu2019s just irresistible. The first time I smelled it, I thought to myself u201cGrumpy Bear!u201d, which was a perfume that I bought at Hot Topic and wore all through High School that they later discontinued. It was a fragrance mainly composed of vanilla and pear. The One doesnu2019t contain pear, but the way the composition showcases the vanilla and peach gives it a very similar feel. To me this is the perfect perfume for someone who doesnu2019t like perfume. Itu2019s young and light, but also complex enough to ease someone into a more sophisticated sent. The One is definitely one of my all-time favorites, but since Iu2019m a basket of contradictions, so is Chanel No5 who Iu2019ve heard from many people that they are turned off by what they think smells too elderly in aldehydes, so donu2019t let what I said about it being a perfume for non-perfume lovers give you a bad idea of it. Perfume lovers, I presume, would find it equally as charming.
My favorite perfume in an easy to travel roll on. Perfect!!
The one. Is to strong personality, unique, luxurious & glamour scent. I love this perfume.

I finally purchased this fragrance after a solid year of coveting my best friend's bottle of Dolce perfume. The scent is fresh, multi-layered, unique, and I get compliments on it constantly! It has good staying power and is very compatible with my natural smell. I think this is my signature perfume!
I love it more and more each day. Been using it since 09. It even helps my headaches ;)
Absolutely love it!!!!!!!!! My favourite by far

I just loved Dolce & Gabbanau2019s The One. It smells very sweet with floral note such as Lily and Jasmine. I smelled a hint of Amber and Vanilla. The fragrance is very tempting, romantic and elegant all in one. My husband just loves the scent. This fragrance last all day and just as strong. I would definitely recommend this fragrance to my friends

UGH I HATE THAT THIS IS TOO GOOD.. It's funny but I got a mini bottle as a xmas gift from a coworker and the first time I smelled it, I HATED it so much but once I sprayed it on myself and let it linger, OMG. My boyfriend LOVES THIS. It's a mix of different personalities rolled into one. Glamorous, adventurous, classic, feminine, mysterious, sweet girl next door, unique, just everything. I actually got the fragrance sampler so I can find other scents that can become my signature scent, but unfortunately nothing still compares :( Giorgio Armani SI comes pretty close I believe.It's the perfect floral oriental fragrance and is perfectly balanced, not too flowery nor too rich.
I can't boast enough of how much I love this perfume. So warm, soft and just elegant all at once. My go to for everyday and going out. Extremely romantic

LOVE this perfume its my signature! If I could, I would douse myself in it all the time. I wear it to work, and its perfect for date nights- men seem to love this fragrance. There's just something about it- I feel sexy when I wear it. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_title: Wish it would last a little longer
reviews.review_text: Love the fragrance once it's on though it melts away within an hour (at least on me ) Will use it up and try something else next time... It is so delicious smelling!
I love this fragrance in the roll bottle so that you can apply without a fuss.
This perfume smells amazing. Would recommend it to anyone who wants a sophisticated smelling perfume.

A sophisticated, sexy scent that I love to wear on dates. I do find it isn't quite as long lasting as I would prefer, but I am addicted to spraying it as often as possible anyways. Definitely recommend if you like a mature, understated and sexy scent that isn't too floral.
This is definitely a staple and essential everyday fragrance. The smell is warm, sultry, and classy. It screams sophistication.

A very easy to wear warm scent that would make a great gift for anyone starting out with fragrances. I love layering this with brighter, fruitier scents or wearing it on it's own. The vanilla note in this makes it especially addicting yet comforting at the same time - try it you'll love it!

I've been wearing this scent for years, and I am in the mood to buy another perfume just to try something new, but every time I sample something else nothing even comes close to The One.  This is a recognizable scent that is classic but not as overpowering and heady as Chanel, while still having lasting power. It starts off strong, and lingers subtly throughout the day. I can still smell it on my scarf or on my skin after a full day of wear, but it is never over-the-top or headache-inducing.  At first I saved this perfume for special occasions such as date night, but I find myself gravitating towards it during the day too because it adds something special and makes me excited to start my day. It's especially perfect when paired with a cozy sweater during the fall and winter months because of the amber, plum, and vanilla notes.  What I love about this scent is that it is warm. It is the scent of a woman who is classy and polished, independent, but also warm, feminine, and nurturing. Definitely a grown-up woman, but not old lady. It makes an excellent signature scent.

Seriously loved this until I smelled the dry down. Smells very powdery and musky to me after a couple hours. Sad to say I will be returning this.. I really liked how it smelled at first!! I would suggest getting a sample and wearing it around before taking the plunge and purchasing-- it's a little pricey!!

I love roller balls - probably upwards of 30 scents/brands in my collection. Dolce & Gabbana The One is in my top 3 favorites. However, it is probably just as important to note that the only perfume my husband has commented on is this one. He loves it!

My go to! My friend turned me onto this perfume and I havent been able to replace it ever since. It smells amazing and despite the price tag, I find myself coming back to it time and time again. It just cannot be beat!
Amazing, I wear it everyday!!
My work week scent . Soft and feminine

Obviously, scent is a very personal thing, so if you don't like the smell, you don't like it. I love this so much - light, sexy, and not fruity. My husband loves it. My sister used to wear it a lot and thank god she lives across the state because heaven forbid we have the same scent! It wouldn't matter, though, this is my number one favorite scent - both for day and night. Wish it wasn't so expensive, but I really don't care.

I got a sample of this with a recent order and I am in love! My favorite fragrances are more warm and spicy (I can't stand strong florals...they give me a headache) and this one fit perfectly! It reminds me of a slightly less strong LoverDose (which Sephora no longer carries :() and it is very inviting.
Not sure if I've forgotten what it smells like, or if the travel size just smells like old sunscreen. Sad, I thought I'd love it.

This one is just ok, nothing outstanding as it proclaims to be. It is said to be a floral oriental but I only get the floral notes and something powdery. It is a nice floral scent but it doesn't last very long on and overall it isn't anything special. Maybe a good one for people who like Cartier Baiser Vole.
My favorite scent going on 4 years. I like the rollerball for a quick refresh during the day.

This is similar to Pour Femme for me. I tried samples of both. This is a nice warm and cozy sort of floral vanilla. Not very sweet, but very cuddly. For me though it didn't last as long as I wanted, about 5 hours. Out of the two I'm sticking with Pour Femme, a little sweeter and longer lasting for me.

This is the only perfume I actually like. Because it seemed kind of pricey, I tried many MANY others and came to the conclusion that it is well worth the price. It is hard for me to describe the actual scent (floral but mellow, with a hint of citrus?), but all I know is that I love it! Strong perfume reminds me of my grandmother, so I wouldn't consider myself a big perfume person. This one however is light, even if you accidentally spray a bit too much. My guy friends like it as well. One of my male colleagues (who would normally have perfume trigger his allergies) asked me what I was wearing because he liked the smell and wanted to have his fiancee try it out. My boyfriend also loves it, who mentioned that normally he associates perfume with little old ladies, but this one is fresh and youthful. I highly recommend this to any girl who wants a good-smelling perfume that doesn't overpower the room, yet is noticeable in a positive way.
I beyond loveeeee this purfume. Smells wonderful. But its really expensive and the smell doesn't last that long.

I love how this perfume smells when you first spray it on. If the smell stayed that way, I would be giving it 5 stars. I can smell the bergamot and the citrusy mandarin and peach mixed with the feminine jasmine and warm amber. It's a lovely and unique blend. But the dry down is something different. It just dries down to the general powdery sort of smell you get by walking through the cosmetics department of a department store combined with a musky sort of scent. This is so disappointing considering how wonderful the fragrance started out being. And after an hour and a half, the fragrance is gone completely (and I put a lot on.) Because the good fragrance has no stamina, I'd have to rate this one at just average.

I LOVE this scent. It is a mixture of musky, vanilla, spice, and a unusual floral scent. I typically prefer fruity, floral scents, but I'm switching to this one. Sadly, it's expensive, but the rollerball is all you really need.

I wish that I would have waited before buying this. Don't get me wrong, it by no means is bad or in any way a lesser scent, it's just not significant at all. When I smell it, I feel like it's a scent that I've smelled a million times before. That's why instead of being a standout, it's just blah.

I love the scent and was super excited to get a response from my friends, and i got nothing. The scent goes away too fast. As soon as i switched to another perfume(Burberry Brit) everyone commented. I did purchase the rollerball. Does the spray last longer? If so i would give it another try.
A warm sensual scent wih a touch of sweetness. A wonderful fragrance and a little goes a long way. I would be careful wearing this to work. Would repurchase.
lovely classic, sexy, slightly floral scent. a keeper!!

I'm in love with The One! I have a tough time finding scents that don't set off my allergies. The One is a lovely balanced scent. Not overly floral. It's just perfect & I get complements on it every day. It's now MY perfume! Love it!!

I am always on the hunt for a new scent. When I received a sample of this with a previous order, I knew I had to have it. The One is the perfect feminine scent- sultry and spicy and just a little bit sweet. I personally don't like floral scents, but the hint of jasmine and vanilla really bring it home for me. As I'm quickly discovering, bergamot is one of my favorite scents, as long as it's not too overpowering. This scent does just that. I bought the rollerball size, and will probably buy the full size spray soon enough. My sole complaint is that it is not incredibly long-lasting. It will stand up on its own for about 8 hours, but after that it needs reapplication or you need to be close to the application site to smell it.

This is indeed a very sensual yet light scent. It's more flowery than fragrances that I usually choose, but I was drawn to it and the way it smelled on my skin. My only complaint is that for the price, I would expect it to have a bit more staying power.
This is a great light fragrance, good scent for day or night.
I'm in love with Dolce & Gabanna The One perfume! It has the most beautiful sexy scent I have came across. It is truly my signature scent!

I have been wearing this scent for a couple of years now and I have to say it is my favorite. I do wear other scents, but always come back to this one. It is light but noticeable. I get compliments every time I wear it. I even get an occasional whiff of it on myself and think....mmmmmm, so beautiful.
Just smelling this perfume makes me feel even older. It smells like perfume my grandma should like but doesn't because she's not old enough yet. No. Just no. Smells terrible.

reviews.review_title: I would build a home out of this
reviews.review_text: I had actually stopped wearing perfume quite a number of years ago. When I was a teenager I wore Clinque Happy, and that pink perfume form GAP. However all the samples we get with purchases had inspired me to try wearing it occasionally. I was enjoying the Nest Passiflora scent, but found it quite strong to start and wasn't entirely satisfied (to give some comparison). When I saw the name of this scent I thought how egotistical, I'm sure it's going to be a bust. Holy crow was I wrong! I wish I could wear this scent every single day and just LIVE in it. Forever. However, I have decided this is the perfect romantic scent and reserve it for special occasions... if I can muster the self control. Seriously, this makes you FEEL things in a sensual way. Like, right in the core of your being. SO I bought a roller ball, because the other size were just too much. and as I mentioned, I'm not into perfume. I just enjoy fabulous scents.
Out of the box of old lady samples I received, this is actually one I kind of digged. Much younger touch from the Cartier I also received.

I can't even explain this scent, but it's amazing. Super sexy, yet somehow not aggressively so. Deliciously citrus-y yet somehow just floral enough and with something else I can't explain. My only complaint is that it's so expensive, or I'd wear it all the time!

reviews.review_title: Oh, so wonderful of a scent
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. Can't get enough of it. I have to stop myself from wearing it daily just so I can make it last longer. It's a great mix of sexy, flirty and girly at the same time. Also smells pretty fresh too. Just love it!
Got a sample of this and fell in love! It's a nice, light smell. The only con is that it isn't as long lasting as I wanted.

I didn't expect to like this - but I did! It has a classic and timeless smell to it without reminding you of your grandma. It is a clean scent. Only problem is that it is not very long-lasting. Otherwise, I like!

I tried to like the oh-so-popular light blue fragrance but it just refused to mix and smell right with my body chemistry. I came across this scent at the last minute, took a quick smell and was IN LOVE. It's so nice, light yet warm and inviting. Alluring. I splurged and purchased the 3oz and now I desperately need the lotion as well. Not to mention hubby is opposed to all scents, he thinks just a subtle natural deodorant is enough and perfume is just flashy and smells like an old lady BUT on one of our date nights, I spritzed this behind my ears, dab on my wrists and a little on my chest and we almost didn't make it out the door! He said whatever your wearing, this is a forever fragrance because I love it, it just draws me in I think we have a winner!! Plus, I've noticed my daughter stealing a few spritzes here and there as well. This definitely is The One!

I'm very picky about perfume but I love this. I was surprised that some of the reviews say it's an old lady perfume. While it is a more mature scent than say, Taylor Swift's perfume, it does not smell powdery or anything. I am 21 and don't think it's too mature for me, but it would also be appropriate for an older woman. It also doesn't fade too quickly like some perfumes. I had a sample size bottle which lasted a while. I recently purchased the rollerball and plan to bring it with me for a semester in Europe, so I hope the bottle lasts the entire semester. Perfect for both daily wear and going out. The scent is very classy and seems like something I won't tire of.

My sister wears this perfume. I originally purchase the one rose but, I returned it for the original. I love the smell. I usually wear floral scents. This perfume is not floral. It smells clean but, not laundry detergent clean. It's kind of powdery but, not baby powdery. I love it. I get a lot of compliments. It's smells like no other fragrance. It also last much longer then the one rose.

This is a really light, sexy fragrance. I got a sample of it a couple of months ago and my husband loved it so much, he bought me the biggest bottle available for Christmas.  So, yeah, I figured out what his favorite perfume sample was... Luckily, it was my favorite too!
I received this as a Christmas gift because I had run out of my first bottle. I receive compliments whenever I wear this. It's a light, sexy fragrance.

I'm hard to shop for when it comes to perfume and was hoping I would enjoy the scent once I got it home. A very mature smell with a weird undertone. Hopefully I will get used to it because at this point, I am unable to return. Will not be purchasing Dolce & Gabbana in the future.
Love the rollerball cuz I can slide it into my bag for quick refreshers of the sexy, feminine fragrance.
I love this scent. I bought the roller and love it for travel

reviews.review_title: The perfect scent for any occasion !!
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this perfume. It smells amazing !! I always get asked what perfume I'm wearing && I always recommend this! It's so worth the price, best perfume ever. I can't get enough !!

I started wearing The One about 7-8 years ago.  When my daughters were little and I would have to travel for work, I would spray this perfume on a new little stuffed animal so the could snuggle with mommy when I was overseas. All these years later, I've stayed true. I've tried other scents on in the store but to be honest, my girls (10 and 11) flip out every time and refuse to let me smell like anything other than mom.  Guess you have a customer for life :-)

The One is warm, creamy, powdery and clean cut. The dry down brings off a delicious vanilla sweetness and I can see why this is described by some as u2018temptingu2019. It is a very powerful yet elegant and sophisticated scent. I would prefer to wear this in the cooler months for that much needed warmth. A beautiful and unique parfum, unlike no other.

I got the free sample version of this and, after trying at least twenty samples, this one stayed with me like no other fragrance. Has to be the bergamot, because I'm just as obsessed with the smell of Earl Grey tea. Before, I was fine just existing off of free samples, but I loved this scent so much, I had to get the rollerball!

reviews.review_title: I never knew I could want something so badly...
reviews.review_text: I got this perfume as an impulse sample, mostly because there weren't any other available samples that caught my eye. I really didn't have any expectations for it because, to be honest, the bottle looks like it probably smells much more old lady-ish. Well, we all know what they say about judging a book by its cover, right? This perfume completely surprised me and I instantly fell in love with it! It's warm and sweet, not overpowering, and doesn't sting the nostrils even when first applied and most potent. I'm not one to spend a ton of money on perfume, though, so instead I'll be dropping relentless birthday present hints to my husband. If that doesn't work, I may just become that kind of person and buy it anyway, because this one is totally worth it. ;)
The best one out there. I prefer this for winter. Not over the top, knock down strong.
Amazing! I just love this smell!!
I have the sample of this perfume and I must say it is to die for. I love the scent of it and I will be purchasing the roller ball sometime soon in the future.

I'm not usually a perfume person. I usually can't justify spending a lot of moneye on a little bottle. But this perfume is anazingggg. I've loved it ever since I first smelled it on my roommate in college. I'm 23 & I don't think this perfume smells old lady like or is too girly and sweet. Its perfect & is really classy. I will probably keep buying this perfume my whole life! :)

I love this perfume. I got it as a gift from my husband and it smells amazing. It lasts a very long time and it only takes one spray. I spray on my neck once and my wrist once then rub it in. My only complaint is that it is not for everyday use in my opinion. It's very VERY strong if you spray more than once or twice and very overpowering. I use it when I'm going out or for special occasions but not for work or when I'm out running around during the day. The scent is perfect for fall and winter and for the holidays! It's so beautiful and classy. Very mature smelling and it lasts for several hours. I het compliments every day that I use it. I'm definitely buying it again!

reviews.review_title: They will want to eat you!!
reviews.review_text: It smells so delicious to me. When it settles in it is definitely a head turner. I've found another favorite!

It's difficult to describe what this fragrance smells like, but it is WOW! The first time I used it, I was like what on earth is this but it really grows on you. I'm in my late 20's but I don't think this scent is too old for me or grandmother-y like the other reviewers. Unless your grandmother is a real bombshell. I will be buying one of these as an Xmas gift for my sister - I'm that confident she'll like it as much as I do.
I'm 17 and I've fallen in love with this perfume! it is slightly a bit of an older scent but in a way its very mature, and i love that kind of scent.

I got a mini 5ml bottle just today at Sephora in Barrie through my Beauty Insider points and instantly fell in love with this perfume. When I put it on I instantly felt a rich and sophisticated vibe.  It does have a bit of an older smell, as in a smell that may remind you of your grandmother but nonetheless it is quite versatile and even I, who is 22, can wear it and still give off a youthful smell.  All in all a great perfume that can suit any age!!!
This is by far my favorite perfume. It has an amazing fragrance. I will def. buy over and over again.
Got a travel size for my auntie and she loves so much~

I had this matched for me using the fragrance finder in the sephora store and I couldnt be more thrilled. Its soft, warm and intoxicating. This is perfect for fall/winter. A true staple in any fragrance wardrobe. You wont be disappointed.

I received the trail size and I was super excited because DUH! it's Dolce, however it smells like what and old lady would wear. It's powdery and the scent is super strong. I'm under 30 and I don't even think grandmothers should wear this. It's not a good smell.

Body chemistry will be key with this scent. It has an amazingly neutral arora and as it settles it has a lighlty pleasant after tone. The scent is mature and very distinct. Personally, it's definitely a signature or go to perfume depending on the occassion. It will be a part of my collection of perfumes for a while or until I tire of it, which just may be NEVER. I definitely recommend this product.
I love this fragrance!!!! It's amazing and stays all day. Very subtle. Very girly. Very feminine and girlie
This is by far the most amazing smelling perfume I've EVER had! I have NOTHING bad to say about the scent!

I really like The One. It has the warm oriental notes that I like so well. I am very happy that I read reviews on it and decided to give it a try. Seems to last quite a while and does not give me a headache. I have trouble with some fragrances but this worked out very well.
smells great in the bottle! handle with care this scent changes in to a dirty armpit scent on me. sad. love it otherwise.

This has been my signature scent for the last two years, after trying out a sample scent strip from a magazine. It is absolutely intoxicating. I prefer a lighter scent with many layers and this perfectly fits the bill. Even women have asked me ... What are you wearing??!! I LOVE it!
Every time I want a signiture fragrance they seem to out of production. The last one Sicily, from Dolce $ Gabbana was my last so I tried the one and it now the one I'm going to use!
I got a sample of this and it's amazing im defintely ganna get the full size ! It's so creamy, clean and sexy. I picture wearing this perfume while sitting in a fancy cafe during fall season :)

I love DOLCE & GABANA perfumes, I own the Dolce perfume and it's amazing. The Light Blue is a little too much of a just clean scent, but it's nice. I got The One a a deluxe sample and it's sensual and sexy. It has undertones of vanilla and something else that's more spicy. Very feminine. I will buy the full size after I run out of Dolce. I also like the Miss Dior, it's more light and airy though.
Sexy, warm and sensual, but not at all heavy on my skin. Can be worn in summer and winter. Good staying power too. I love it!

The one and rose the one are my all time favorite perfumes. I am in love with this scent in particular because it's not quite as strong and leaves behind a slightly sweet but sexy spice smell. The only downside is staying power.
I got this as a sample the other day and absolutely love it! It's fresh and flowery and yet sweet at the same time. Overall, great perfume.
Love it as much as Dior Addict! I get lots of compliments on this sweet/powdery scent.
So glad to have this scent in a travel-friendly rollerball! It's much easier to control how much I put on and can take it with me no problems when I travel or want to keep in my purse for later.

This is so delicious. I came in to replace my Marc Jacobs Lola perfume and the sales person talked me into this instead. It's warm with a little vanilla undertone and I get so many compliments on this perfume!

OMG this smells amazing!!!! I have tried D&G Rose the One - which smells amazing but it only lasts about an hr. So I wasn't really even interested in trying this scent esp since I've read online that it is really sweet. Well it is but in a really good way. It's almost velvety smelling, if that makes any sense at all. Totally try it out - you will get tons of compliments :)

I went into Sephora intending to buy a different perfume until I tried this and (sorry I have to say it!) knew it was 'The One'! I love perfumes that have a musky note to them. This is alluring and feminine without being overpowering and has real staying power. I bought the roller ball size and it travels perfectly. I love it!

This is my new signature. It's intoxicating!! I still love all my Gucci and Chanel along with my fresh fumes; Lanvin & Annick Goutal. But this smells soo sexy and it actually LASTS A LONG TIME. Something that for some reason lately just seems to be hard to find? A Great scent that really lasts!!!!! It's definitely a must try, to say the least.

I received a sample size several months ago after smelling it at the store. Let me tell you how good this smells...outside of my Chanel perfume, this is by far my second favorite. It is a must have in every girl's stash.
Love this fragrance! I wear it everyday. I get asked all the time what it is. I dont have any other preference but this..
This perfume is absolutely amazing. the smell lasts all day long and it is not too strong. A bit pricey but totally worth it :) Gorgeous packaging as well
I love this so much. It smells amazing and stays on long. But this more for Wintertime, I wouldn't wear this in the Summer just because its more of a warm fragrance not a refreshing oneq

It's a daytime and night time scent I bought it for the fall.. I wanted something heavy I like heavy vanillas /sandalwood for cooler weather.... It's heavy but light smells expensive and is a lovely sexy fragrance..My man loved it on Valentine's day .The packaging is sturdy and thick just so if you drop it No worry..bought myself medium sized bottle and my sister a rollerball as well. a 10 !!

This is a feminine scent but sophisticated at the same time-but not old lady sophisticated, MODERN sophisticated. I don't wear perfume very often and usually own ONE until I run out and then I buy another bottle...but I'm seriously considering buying this. I'm basing my review on a 5ml sample I received from sephora.
hotel powder room. I love the scent, don't get me wrong. The scent is very luxurious yet not overpowering. The scent will definitely make you feel as if you are in a five star luxury hotel.
If you're into timid, powdery florals this is the scent for you. I got a deluxe sample and I'm very glad I didn't pay for it, as it'd be going straight back to the store.

I bought this to wear on my wedding and have been addicted ever since. It is an incredibly sultry and sexy scent. I do only wear it on special occasions though, partly to reminisce about my wedding and partly because I feel it is too strong for everyday wear.
Love this, but the staying power is weak.
This is my go to fragrance. I love the spiciness of the scent but it is not overpowering. The scent is warm and addicting.
I love this scent. The portable roller-ball size is great to keep in your purse The rollerball was a bit pricey, but it's portable and I love the scent so it was worth it to me.
Not hAppy .. I bought the roll on .. Not a string scent .. The male version is sexy
If you like amber this would be great, I'm not a fan of amber so this went back to the store. The top citrus notes are virtually undetectable.

I wanted a simple and not too strong scent for the fall, however I could not resist and now I wear it all the time. I am very picky when it comes to perfume. But this scent is an elegant and great scent!
One of my favorite perfumes
Now this scent is new to my collection I love the dominance in combination with my body chemistry sultry!

I've been using Burberry Brit... but just got tired of it, and felt it's become the cliche perfume for most people. I was excited to finally get a hold of The One. And I will just say this: no regrets. This is my new go-to. Not too sweet, and just mature enough for my age. Versatile to use for work, on dates, and just because!
I had purchased The One for men for my partner and decided to try the women's version.....LOVE IT. Nothing sexier!

I have been wearing this fragrance since 2009, and this is the only fragrance of all the parfums I've had that I feel I will wear forever! It's just so alluring! I usually wear it on nights out or special ocassions and It's just perfect!!! When I first got it I was so hooked that I couldn't help but to sleep with it on... lol... It is luxurious, clean, sexy, elegant, original, enchanting... I mean... it's a very complicated scent to describe, but what's for sure is that it's worth every single penny!

This is a little too heavy for me to wear during the day but at night I rock this scent! It's sexy, a little mysterious, and so feminine! I wasn't too sure about it when I first put it on but after it settled this scent blew me away. I'll definitely be buying this again.

reviews.review_title: best scent that has ever reached my nose
reviews.review_text: In love with this! received it as a sample and haven't used anything since! it's intoxicating
HAVE BEEN WEARING FOR YEARS AND LOVE TO WEAR!!
my signature scent love the smell of it & love the fact you can carry it in your purse & apply whenever needed.
I actually got a free sample and I loved the smell. It is perfect for the winter. Not too overpowering. Love the roll on, easy to apply without walking through the perfume cloud.
This is a very unique and classy scent. It is oriental but not too overbearing. It's warm and I really like it, very pretty.
This is a very classy smell and is warm and a oriental floral. I personally am not a fan of this, but it is unique and pretty nice.

got this today as a gift. poure femme is my fave. wasn't sure I would like this one because I hate light blue. this is a nice. smells sweet, a bit fruity floral. I smell lily and a bit of musky vanilla. long lasting. nice for day or night.
Sexy, chic, sophisticated smell. Warm and edgy.
Like this scent. Glad I tried it in the travel size rollerball.
I was searching for something sexy and feminine. I absolutely love love love. It's fresh and it lasts. I have gotten numerous compliments so far. Another suggestion would be Especially Escada
This is good for wearing on my outgoings its calm and light for a simple person that doesn't want to grab attention

this is one of those perfumes that you smell, say no way, then come back to and smell 10 more times. It's AMAZING. It's soft, yet strong; powdery, yet floral; heavy, yet light. It's a must smell. Bought the rollerball to try out - so far, I'm loving it.

reviews.review_title: they got the name on point
reviews.review_text: I went to the store and wanted something fresh and different and I couldn't find anything until I.smelled this and I said this is the one, not even knowing the name

I picked up a sample vial of this while I was in my local Sephora store. I liked the fragrance when I sprayed it, but I have to try perfumes before buying as some do tend to give me a headache after I have worn them for a few hours or so. I have worn The One for several days now and I love the way it smells on me. It is a very classy, romantic, expensive smell.

I've been using this roller ball for 3 weeks now, almost daily. I haven't gotten a single compliment, which is strange because I usually get positive comments when I switch fragrances. Personally, I like it. It's a nice subtle fragrance for daily wear. I wouldn't describe it as a very sweet or romantic fragrance. I would need something else for, say, a date. I'll keep this in my arsenal for travel to conferences, etc.
Love this scent! Very sweetly sexy. I get a lot of musk from this, maybe a tad too much, other than that it's perfect. A good scent for the late twenty-somethings and up. Already purchased!

This is not a perfume I would put on every day. I had one of the guys at work smell it and it was actually better on him than me! The smell was strong and musky, not something I would recommend for someone young.

reviews.review_title: Not bad but not what I expected
reviews.review_text: This is not a bad scent but wasn't quite what I was looking for; it's much more floral and fruity for the first while and takes a long time to transition to the warmer under tones I expected. It might just be my body chemistry. I also can't tell much of a difference between this and D&G The One Desire. I bought this and then received a sample of the D&G Pour Femme Intense which was exactly what I needed and will be exchanging this for that.

D&G The One has to be one of my favorite fragrances hands down. Not only does the scent last all day, you only need a little bit of it. I sprayed some behind my ears and I could smell it the whole day. Ladies I would recommend getting this fragrance,your man won't want to take his hands off of you I promise. If a man is reading this buy this for the special woman in your life.
I asked for this as a Christmas gift last year. When I didn't get it, I bought it for myself. OMG I am obessed. Love, love, LOVE it!

Like others, I received this as a sample. My overall, current opinions/thoughts on this scent can be summed up in two words: dangerous and sexy.  The first time I tried it, I thought, WHOA, OLD LADY SCENT. However, after it settled on my skin, I was blown away at how sexy this is. I love oriental fragrances, and this one has just enough sweetness to balance it out and make a very sexy, fall/winter scent.  It lasts all day on me with only a few dabs on my wrists and behind my ears. It is a strong scent but still youthful and delicious...I feel like I should wear this if I ever wanted to seduce someone or go on a secret mission :)  Huge fan of this. Next paycheck will be purchasing myself a bottle so I can feel sultry and mysterious.
This is mt winter scent i feek so luxurious when u wear this scent sexy and unuque can go wrong with this scent

I got this as a sample, and after one day of use I just got online and bought a bottle. This is probably one of the best fragrances I have ever smelled. Would give it 5 stars if it lasted longer. It's got it all. Slightly sweet without being sickeningly sweet. A little floral, but not too much. Very sensual. I love love love anything with vanilla & this doesn't disappoint. The lychee & peach add something really different and awesome! It's not like anything I have ever smelled before. Each time I smell it I catch a new exciting hint of something different. Not too strong or overpowering. I carry the sample in my pocket and reapply during the day. Got a lot of compliments/questions on what I was wearing. I don't like anything that is what I call Old lady perfume - you know the kind, VERY strong, overpowering, make you gag & give you a headache type stuff that smells like industrial cleaner. This is very modern, youthful.
Smells very feminine but not to strong or floral. Hubby loves it!

This is the epitome of a sexy, warm vanilla scent. I am in LOVE with Dolce & Gabbana's The One. I definitely smell the peach when I first spray this on, but it isn't overly sweet (probably due to the addition of bergamot). After that, it's creamy vanilla musk on me. This is such a warm scent and I adore wearing it!
Love it, the smell stay long but not too strong. The rollerball bottle is very easy to bring around and not leak.

I was first attracted to this perfume because of its warm vanilla notes -- I really like that in a perfume, but also want these notes paired with a nice floral for sophistication. This perfume does not disappoint. I'm on my second large bottle, and this has become my signature sent. I am completely in love with the sent, and my only complaint is that the perfume is not concentrated enough and fades fast.
I have loved this scent for years. It is soft and warm, perfectly versatile. I recommend this for someone who loves warm, woodsy notes, but hates overwhelmingly cloying sweetness.

I bought this first in a roller ball to see if it gave me a headache, LOVED it and waited to buy the bottle for my birthday. I love everything about this fragrance, especially the dry down of vanilla and musk, my two favorite scents! Best thing about this is that it lasts ALL day!!
This smells luxurious yet at the same time subtle.

This fragrance oozes sensuality! I cannot get enough of it. Very warm, inviting & sensuous. The bergamot, plum, vanilla and amber nicely dry down on the skin. Lovely fragrance. Perfect for fall/winter/early spring.
I can't smell this -- it just smells like nothing -- maybe a very faint floral. I know I can't smell some musks, so that is probably what is causing this. Try a tester before you buy!
This scent is soft and just a little sweet but has incredible staying power. I have been wearing it for over 3 years and I just cannot bring myself to switch! I get so many compliments.

I fell in love with this scent and have been wearing it for 3 yrs now. It has the perfect balance of sweetness. And I love that it is long wearing. I can smell it the next day on my scarf or jacket. And my boyfriend loves it :)
I love this rollerball. This is my third one - I keep losing them, and this is the one I keep coming back to! Love it!

I purchased the rollerball version of this scent, and this scent really works with my body chemistry. It's warm without being overpowering. I've become rather sensitive to scent throughout the years, and this one is really pleasant.

reviews.review_title: I like Rose The one better
reviews.review_text: It is a nice scent, but it smells a bit too middle age. It is nice for someone who likes a musky and sweet vanilla type of smell, but I really like the Rose one better. That one smelled a bit fresher and a bit more youthful. It's not to say that this is not good, but I'm glad I bought the roller ball to try it out.

I've been searching for a signature scent, a fragrance that I can call my own for quite a while now. I've tried other fragrances but The One is the only fragrance where people said, hmmm...you smell good on a consistent basis. I think it's the delightful combination of Oriental flower with the sexiness of musk that creates the most delicious fragrance. I can now say I found The One to call my own.

After spending hours in a mall with the BF looking for the best scent that both he and I loved this was the ONLY scent we both really fell for. It's great year round and gives off that chill beach girl vibe. Love it!

Wasn't sure I'd like it since I'm not a fan of fruity scents, but The One is exactly what every woman needs in her purse! I may not need to use it after I leave the house, but it's nice to know it's there, it lasts for hours w/o fading as more expensive perfumes tend to do. Waiting for The One in Rose to come out in a roller all, such a great way to try a perfume w/o wasting money in case it doesn't blend well w/ your personal chemistry! So many great perfumes to try, so little time!!!!
This is very sexy! I wish I had spent the extra money for the next size up. Sexy and beautiful! THIS IS A MUST BUY!!!

I am a fan of jasmine, vanilla, and most oriental scents. I got a sample of this and knew we would be well matched.  The scent is very sensual and warm, something I would wear on a hot summer night or in the dead of winter -- just a touch so that when he comes near, he is drawn in without choice.  First application is a bit strong, but the dry down is lovely. So glad I bought this and highly recommend for warm oriental floral lovers.  Two thumbs up for a rollerball version!
I am a lover of spicy, warm oriental fragrances. When I first tried this - it fit my scent profile but as it dried down it lost its sensual spiciness (on me). It is a lovely fragrance but not for me.
I recommend this scent ,, last all day! Thank D&G
This is by far, my all time favourite perfume... d&g is amazing & this perfume is such a classic. Lasts all day long too... just perfect & so worth the money! Grab the rollerball for traveling too!
Love!!!!!! Stays on and smells heavenly
This is going to be a legend like White Diamonds and others. Definitely one of my top go to scents. It makes you feel sexy!
Love the subtle non-intrusive notes of this sophisticated perfume. I get tons of compliments when I wear it. And now it comes in a small travel size! Love it and keep coming back to buy more
I've been wanting to purchase this fragrance for a long time, finally did. It makes me feel like I've arrived. Very sexy and sensual. Thank you Dolce & Gabbana
Lovin this scent it's HOT !!!!!
the name says it all
So glad they made a rollerball of The One, I'd been wanting to try it for ages and it is such a subtle scent that lasts for HOURS!!!!!!
This my guilty indulgence, my gift to myself. A definite must have!

This was a repeat purchase. Dolce & Gabbana is one of my favorite scents. I needed a new rollerball to carry around in my purse! I love having it with me, in case I need a refresher. It's also great for travel. It's much easier to carry the rollerball, than a bottle of perfume. Great scent. Will keep buying more!

reviews.review_title: great for a meeting or date
reviews.review_text: I usually wear coco mademeselle, but wanted something a bit more 'loud' in a sexy, but also powerful, way. This is the perfect sent to get noticed. I still default to coco on a daily basis.
i loveeeee the one! it's my signature scent. i like to wear it when i'm going out- i feel like a celebrity when i wear it. it's really unique and sensual, i love it.

Luxurious and seductive. Definitely more appropriate for a night out than an office, but depends on how it stays on your skin. Two friends of mine also have it; the fragrance is amazing on each three of us, but different undertones are expressed in combination with our skins.
I recently purchased the roll on to take it with me everywhere. The roll on is not as strong as the perfume, but still smells good.
I love this fragrance, it smells so sophisticated without beingso overpowering.
Love this fragrance! So soft and sexy! My favorite scent!

D&G got it right when creating this perfume I absoulutely adore The One. Not for the woman who wants to walk by unnoticed, on the contrary this fragrance will definitely attract the attention of anyone nearby. I always get compliments when I wear it. I love it because it makes me feel sexy and my husband concurs!
Warm, sensual, sexy, feminine - that's what a woman should smell like, that's what this EDP is, that's th real scent of Dolce&Gabbana!

I love this perfume! I have a rollerball of it that I carry in my purse. It's a little strong at first, but the staying power is great! If you're sensitive to smells, this might be too much for you. It's definitely one of my favorites though!

I always lean towards floral orientals so after reading the description it's no surprise I adore the One that I got as a sample. At first it reminded me of some hotel soap I can't place and I had kind of written it off, but as it wears it becomes this lovely sweet vanilla that I keep getting more and more addicted to, at least on my skin anyways. For reference I usually wear Flowerbomb and this is more warm, sweet, cashmerey type of scent compared to the warm floral/patchouli of Flowerbomb. I might actually have to switch to this...

I went looking to replace my perfume bc I had just run out. I usually buy the 2.5oz and leave it at home but then I stumbled upon the perfume pen which is the perfect size for a purse. It's a roll-on and I love it. This purchase really made my day.
Way too sweet and thick for me. Doesn't smell sexy at all. It is a heavier version of Viva la Juicy. It does last for a while though.
I received as a sample and fell in love with this fragrance. Just wish it lasted longer than it does.
Oh my!!! I smell soooo good! My friend had this and so I tried it and fell in love with the scent! It is now my go to scent and my husband loves the smell too :-)
Everytime I wear this perfume I get compliments from everyone - friends, strangers, kids, men, women - everyone loves this fragrance - and best of all I love it too. Smells sooooo good!
This is my ultimate favorite scent. I get compliments every time I where it. An ex told me he misses that scent!!!
I love this perfume. Its expensive but smells so yummy! Its very light and the packaging is pretty too :)
This is my signature scent. It's warm and sophisticated, and it lasts all day. I love the entire Dolce & Gabbana line of fragrance.
This is a great product for everyone to try. Great fragrance, great price.

i just purchase the 1oz and when i got home i regretted it because i knew i needed a bigger size. DEFINITELY will repurchase the big one as soon as this one runs out. i'm so addicted. best scent out there for sure. delicious!
Wonderful smell and perfect size
Love this scent - hot sexy classic

I just adore Dolce & Gabbana The One! I have it in the large fragrance, the body lotion and shower gel. I think this fragrance works the best in the springtime, I'm not exactly sure why that is, but as soon as March comes around I always find myself reaching for my bottle of The One. To me this is an absolute classic fragrance. It is so soft and sexy while being warm and sophisticated and also a tiny bit fresh. I own many many fragrances and this is one of the ones that I believe every woman should have. It really seems to attract people, especialy men. I am always getting so many compliments on this from such a variety of people, from men to my mother (who is 56 and who never likes the same fragrances as me) to even some teenagers, this fragrance just seems to appeal to everyone. I really like the other fragrances in The One line, but this one is my favorite. Dolce & Gabbana create many wonderful things, but like I said before this is the one fragrance that I believe every woman should own.

This fragrance isn't bad, I guess it's just not for me. I got a sample with an ordre so I tried it on but it really smells like perfume on me, nothing unique or special. Very classic, but in a good way.

reviews.review_title: Wish I could afford the gift set
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. I was hesitant at first, so I got the travel size. I wish I could exchange it for either a bigger bottle or the gift set. This smells lovely.
this is a warm, sexy scent. i get a lot of compliments for this one
I love the rollerball option, just enough but not a major commitment to one scent. The One is a nice light, warm scent.
This is a fabulous scent! Perfect for work or going out with the girls! A very likable scent you have got to try!
I cannot believe how wonderful this smells. & you only need a little. It is long lasting as well. This is my new favorite perfume

D & G have created a scent that I can officially wear in any weather, during any time of the year and smell amazing. I've worn this is spring showers, summer heatwaves, autumn winds, and winter snowstorms. No matter the season this perfume seems to instinctively match my natural scent. It's not overpowering and it makes me feel seductive and alluring. I've tried several different perfumes since its introduction, and I keep coming back. In short, it's lovely and you will feel lovely wearing it.
This sensual, not to heavy, fragrance must surely be the smell of heaven!

This is a very pretty perfume, and I particularly love the top and middle notes. It opens with a strong, refreshing scent of citrus. The peach, litchi, and bergamot are what I detect the most and I absolutely love it. After an hour, the litchi still remains, but soft florals of jasmine and lily begin to poke through. It quickly evolves into a perfect balance of fruits and floral.  Because of the strong fruity floral scent, I started wondering why so many people said this was best worn in the fall/winter. I really thought that this was u201cthe oneu201d and that I could wear this daily as my signature scent, especially when the vanilla poked through the jasmine and lily after 2 hours of wear. I absolutely love vanilla, so I was very glad to detect its presence. It still smelled pretty light and soft, so I couldnu2019t understand why people were calling this u201cwarm.u201d  But then three hours after wearing this, the incredibly warm vanilla and amber broke all trace of the citrus and floral, and I finally understood why this would not be best for summer. I know I would feel suffocated by the strong vanilla if I wore this in the summer heat. The transformation of this perfume on my skin is very dramaticu2014it started off like summer citrus and floral, and then became winter vanilla and amber.  By the fourth hour, the amber was completely vanished and all I smelled was vanilla. Being such a vanilla fanatic, I was surprised that I was very put off by the vanilla. But it was extremely sweet to the point of nausea. Without the warmth of amber, the vanilla just smelled sticky. Whenever I would catch a whiff of this, I would almost gag because the vanilla was so strong and sticky sweet. I found myself purposely keeping my arms away from myself just so that I couldnu2019t smell the sugary, syrupy vanilla.  This has great longevity and sillage. It lasted well over 7 hours and could be detected by others without being obnoxious. If the vanilla werenu2019t so strong on me, I would absolutely wear this. I donu2019t consider this a mature scent, but itu2019s classy enough to make me feel confident and poised. Itu2019s also not overly glamorous and luxurious enough to be worn only for special occasions. It's best for fall/winter since it gets syrupy and warm. Also, I like how elegant and simple the bottle is. Although itu2019s not u201cThe Oneu201d for me, itu2019s worth trying if you like sweet scents.
I usually wear the original Dolce & Gabbana I received this as a gift and immediately fell in love with it. Be very careful though, your boyfriend/husband won't be able to leave you alone.
Smells delicious. Simple & divine. I love it!!!

I really expected to love this one with the fruits and vanilla and jasmine, but something about it is really heavy. Take the 'strong personality' part of the description seriously. Something in this (the musk? the vetiver?) overwhelms all of the fruit smells for awhile until the scent dries down.

Love this for its freshness and class. My new doing lunch with the girls fragrance, or anywhere else I will be hugging people :). The quality of this product is worlds above anything else I've tried recently.

I happened to get a sample of this with a bunch of other samples. I'm very, very picky with perfumes and can never find one that smells good on me. Currently I'm wearing Chloe (just bought it this past summer), and was just going to throw out this sample without smelling it. So glad I didn't!! This is a wonderful winter fragrance...so sultry and sexy but not overbearing, old, or too musky! It can be worn throughout the day, not just in the evening. The lasting power is about 8 hours when using a rollerball, which is what I bought. BUT I'm going to buy the gift set as soon as I can after the holidays. On me, this perfume starts out great and ends up just as great. I can really smell the peach notes on me, which I love. So glad I found this perfume!

Most scents are too strong and over powering, they either stink or give me a headache however, The One is amazing! It's not overpowering even from the moment you spay it on. It's subtle and has staying power. Every time I wear this I get compliments. I will definitely repurchase this product.

This is my FAVORITE perfume. Not only, did I received it within three days of placing my order, but I couldn't find it cheaper anywhere else. I will continue to shop @ Sephore in stores and on-line as well as recommend it to my friends. Continue to keep up the cheap pricing and you have my loyalty!!
I am so glad it comes in a smaller version, this is my scent but I cant always afford the bigger bottle and this last forever can smell it on me the next day!

I have three D&G perfumes. The One, light blue, & rose the one. I Love all three. This one is the sexiest scent out of all. It makes me feel so confident & ready for the day.its a must have.light blue is my everyday perfume because its fresh & mild, the one is for special days & rose the one is also for special days. You won't regret this purchase. I've recieved many compliments on it.

As a young woman trying to grow out of the highly saccharine scents geared towards the young, I have to say that this perfume is the perfect transition; it has the bright floral notes I'm drawn towards, but in a toned down and sophisticated way that gives it a sense of maturity.  To those in my place who are looking for a more adult scent, but aren't too keen on heavy musk or powder, I highly recommend The One.
I decided to try something different this fall/winter. I am extremely happy with my purchase. This scent is sultry and sexy. Not to mention long lasting. Can be worn to work or party.

I love this perfume as one of my winter scents. It definitely has more of a musky tone to it with a really nice sweet hint of vanilla. All of the bottle sizes are beautifully designed - very sleek. The overall scent is very sophisticated and mature. Great transition perfume if you're one who usually wears fruitier scents for the summer and are looking to upgrade for the colder season.
This is the ultimate fragrance - smells amazing and is long-lasting without being overpowering. I enjoy it all day long (and so do others in close range).
One of my new favorites!

This smells amazing; it smells fruity and oriental. The lasting power however is a bit dodgy; it doesn't last out the door for me, but for other people who have tried it, it seems to last longer. The dry down for this fragrance also doesn't smell very different from the original spritz.

I love florientals, flowerbomb being my favorite. I like the vanilla in this but it seemed a little bright and citrusy, for something called a warm floriental. If you maybe wanted a summer scent to mix in with scents like flowerbomb or miss dior, this would be a good choice.

My husband loves this scent on me and he's very picky with great taste. I bought the roller applicator and it's so handy for the purse for touch-ups. A clean and slightly floral scent which is very fresh.

I think this fragrance has a very broad appeal to the younger and the not-so-young. I've heard from both a guy and a girl in their early 20's that it was their favorite scent. I also find it doesn't change in a weird way like some other fragrances do..it mellows and softens without losing a lot of the complexity. I love it on me, and can't help but repeatedly smell my wrists or the scent on my clothes. It just brings a sigh of happiness. I bought the rollerball size to try it out, but I'm sure I'll be purchasing the larger size soon!

I bought this scent for myself a while ago and now I am purchasing it as a Christmas gift for my mom. I already know she likes the scent as much as I do. It's a scent that compliments any age with contemporary elegance.
Perfect warm scent. Only thing is that it doesn't last long enough. I keep having to reapply.

I ABSOLUTELY LOVED THIS SCENT. Unique, Sexy, Elegant, and my boyfriend loved it. I agree with the description of an oriental, warm, golden sweetness. Couldn't be described better than that. D & G is the best when it comes to perfume. Also my Boyfriend loved it right away.

I've noticed this fragrance on other women before but never asked what it was so I was excited to stumble upon it at Sephora. I really don't like the smell when it is first sprayed but after a few minutes it loses the floral smell and becomes a really warm scent especially when its applied directly to your skin. I find it gets better the longer its on and it lasts a very long time without being overpowering. My new signature scent to replace J'dore Dior!

D&G has once again won its way into my perfume collection. I think this is a perfect winter perfume and every note in this is beautiful! I liked it so much I went back and bought the Rose version. I have always been a light blue fan but I can honestly say that one won't be in use for a while :)

reviews.review_title: glad it works for other women
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this, I wanted something new and bought the rollerball size, but this is too floral for me and gives me a major headache. hopefully I can exchange it for my fave, either hypnotic poison or the new falling in love
You must get this scent. It is one of the best I have ever smelled and lasts forever. You won't ever forget this scent. It is a must have.

Whomever said this smells like hair grease is sooooo wrong. This perfume is a constant go-to for me. It's sensual, warm but yet still flirty. I find that when I wear this perfume guys always tell me I smell heavenly. I had this in a rollerball and recently purchased the full size and couldn't be happier.

this was awful for me. It smells just like hair grease and have me horrible headache for hours! It felt like I had grease in my throat! Yuck! I know a lot of people love it but I m not one of them. The perfume did last a long time on my skin which in this case was unfortunate for me...lol and the bottle is beautiful!

My signature fragrance. The only fragrance I ever wear. I've worn it for years and get compliments on it almost everyday. It doesn't take a lot and lasts all day. It is sweet without being too flowery. I love, love, love it.
This scent is amazing. I receive a lot of compliments. It lasts very long, doesn't wear off. Great for Fall and Winter but I wear it all the time!

I love The One for the Fall and Winter months! It's a very warm and comforting fragrance. I really like that it's inoffensive but it still has the feminine sophistication of a successful working woman. The projection isn't too intense as it wears quite close to the skin. But when people give me hugs or sit really close to me, they tend to compliment me on how nice I smell.  Overall, The One is sweet, but definitely not syrupy. The opening notes are pleasant. I definitely smell the Peach, Lychee, and Madonna Lily notes the most. But my favorite part of this fragrance is the dry down; the vanilla is the dominating base note, though I still sense a hint of peachiness. I also smell a tad bit of amber--just enough to make this appropriate for mature (i.e. more experienced and confident) women without making it grandmothery. There is also a little bit of powderiness, but the powdery scent is very faint.  The fragrance itself lasts on me for at least 12 hours. No joke. Not only does The One cling to my skin long, but the base notes remain addictive. I know there are some perfumes that last long but change into a less pleasant scent, so I am pleased that The One does not do that.  I personally think this is a great winter fragrance for the confident, sophisticated, classy, and sexy woman. I'm glad that I finally found a sweet fragrance that does not conjure up images of obtuse teeny boppers.

Always wanted a wardrobe of fragrances, but couldn't justify the cost -- especially as sprays have an evaporation problem. But now I have four of my faves in rollerball purse sprays. D & G the one always gets complements.

Opulence, sexiness, sophistication all-in-one... these are things in which you can easily correlate with Dolce & Gabbana. This is the truth with this particular fragrance, as well. Which it's name is very well suited to it... The One.  Although this is not in my top 3 fragrances, it would definitely have to be in my top 10. The vanilla, plum, amber, jasmine (the ones I smell the most)... stunning.  I find that this can be wearable for day, or night. It all depends on what type of situation you're in, and where you are. I have worn this to work, on a date, cocktail parties, restaurants, etc. It's very versatile, as well as long lasting.

Dolce and Gabbana's The One is my fragrance obsession. A new favorite. And coming from a self-admitted scent addict? That's a statement.  The scent itself has staying power, but it's not overwhelming. I initially tried the rollerball before ultimately buying the perfume. A quick roll across either the wrists, the crease in your elbow(s), or the nape of the neck? You're all set. (Alternatively, for the perfume, I tend to put a single spray in my hair... and a light one behind the knee. The scent gets to waft across the entire body). Just aim to be light-handed with this perfume if you're less of the floral-loving type. I experimented once with an extra dab on the wrist with the rollerball and the scent became increasingly floral with the Madonna Lily and Jasmine. Personally, I'm INCREDIBLY drawn to the Bergamot, Peach and Amber encompassed in this fragrance, though the Vanilla definitely stands out with my skin chemistry as well. The floral aspects are just enough - not over the top.  This is a unique perfume. While I've smelled scents with somewhat similar notes, I can't recall a scent combination that has been quite as...intoxicating. The scent is modern, sophisticated, and really strikes me as something befitting a woman in her late 20's or early 30's who exudes confidence and class.  I adore this scent, honestly, and I can't recommend it enough.

The one is such a beautiful combination of alluring and warmth. I've worn this frangrance for a few years now and I always receive compliments from men and women. At first I thought it was a bit over powering for the summer but seems to tone down to a perfect balance that lasts all day long. I can't smell it on myself come the end of the day but still receive compliments. I'm hooked on this one.

I tried switching to a different perfume for a few years, but I just couldn't do it. This perfume has the perfect amount of musk and vanilla so it is feminine but not too over the top. It has a depth that even similar perfumes like J'adore lack. It also lingers in a way that other perfumes do not. I put my coat away all summer and when I pulled it out again it still smelled like the one! This is a happy scent that never fails to perk me up a bit.

The smallest version is NOT a spray, it is a rollerball. I do not like rollerballs, I find them difficult to deal with, and I prefer a spray so I can spray it on my clothes rather than skin. I would not have purchased it had I known it was a rollerball, I would've just saved up and bought the next size up at a later time. Sephora, PLEASE change the description as it is very misleading.  The scent itself is nice as ever, warm and inviting.
I was hoping because I love the mens version of The One, I'd really like the womens. Not so, I returned it.

Dolce & Gabbana The One is tempting, modern, and glamorous. Luscious alluring vanilla, soft succulent peaches, fresh jasmine and lily, fruity plum and lychee with sun-kissed citrus notes. A dry down of warm amber, sensual musk and bergamot with a woodsy yet powdery base of vetiver. The One is a must have fragrance for the sexy and classy woman!
I love this scent! I don't usually buy expensive perfume but this one makes me feel classy, feminine, sexy, and young! It's the perfect scent if you need a confidence boost! :]
rich but not overwhelming.

I received this as a gift from my best friend. She was really, really nervous - I never wear standard perfume, only perfume oils, and the only traditional eau de parfum I've ever liked is Shalimar. BUT! I tried it and, initially, it was way too bright, sweet, and fruity. That only lasted about 15 minutes, though, and after it dried, it was vanilla/warm/sweet, which was not bad! The amber, which my skin loves, became super apparent once the perfume warmed to my skin. I have to say, although I love Shalimar, D&G's One is so much cleaner and simpler, just amber and vanilla, and is now my every-day perfume. I'll be getting the rollerball for my purse!

reviews.review_title: Dolce& Gabana EDP - 0.25 oz - Not a Spray
reviews.review_text: This isn't a review really, but if you are planning on buying the smallest size that is listed as a perfume spray on the site - it isn't..it's a rollerball version/labelled as Perfume Pen on the box. It smells good, but it really is not a spray.

This is a fantastic everyday scent. You can definitely smell the vanilla in this one! One of my favorites. Such a sexy, sweet fragrance. Very feminine without being overly floral or fruity. The One seems to last almost all day.
my go to perfume; a sophisticated scent with the right amount of sexiness.
This s by far the BEST perfume in the world. I love the way it smells, so does my husband. Great product.
I love this fragrance..It's smells amazing..I especially love to wear it in the summer.

I absolutely can't say enough good things about this line! This is my going out for cocktails perfume, and I am always asked, by women and men, What is that? It smells incredible! now I realize it is my chemistry with this particular scent also, but if I catch even the slightest note of the Men's version, I am all hot and bothered immediately, lol. I like the way it lingers, especially on linens if I've gone to bed with it on, it just smells sensual. Big big fan of this.

reviews.review_title: Nice scent on others, but not for me
reviews.review_text: I bought this perfume on line after having loved how it smelled on others. It may be The One for others, but it smelled terrible on me! Just a caution to others to try it first with your own body chemistry before investing in any fragrance. Luckily Sephora has a generous return policy and I was able to get my money back.

I'm so sorry to be one of the people who simply dislikes this scent, because I love the bottle, the gold liquid, the image and beautiful black lace design on the limited edition flanker. It's just- I smell kind of a dusty rotting fruit smell on people that wear it, and on myself the same thing. It smells like a dusty, dense vanilla that is old and doesn't have the 'champagne sparkle' to it that I was hoping for from its top notes. I'm glad it works for so many people, and I would love to smell it on someone who's skin makes it glow.
I absolutely love this scent! Very feminine smell and just tempting.

I bought this because I LOVE the smell, but I love it more now because my lover can't keep his hands off me. I wear several scents and usually he says,  You smell nice. But with D&G The One all i have to do is come in the room & he hugs me & says,  Wanna fool around? love it!!
I absolutly love this fragrance! I think it is very soft and warm and pretty and the perfect fragrance for spring! The scent is long lasting and just makes me feel pretty!

I whole-heartedly agree with the last reviewer. I love this fragrance, even though I get bored sometimes and look for something else, I always, always, come back to Dolce Gabanna the one. I also really like L'eau the one for summer, as it is a bit lighter.

reviews.review_title: always go back to this one
