reviews.review_text: I love Dolce & Gabbana. It is softly sweet and unique. I am super picky about what perfumes I like and am always changing them. This one I always come back to.
You will get all sorts of compliments with the one!

This perfume smells amazing. It starts off with a fresh bright citrus smell and then dries down to a warm vanilla amber scent. It lasts ALL day and on clothes it will last until you wash it! It's very expensive, but a little goes a long way. It's absolutely wonderful and has become my go-to fragrance (I used to wear Chanel Coco Mademoiselle the most and this is a similar scent, both floral-oriental however The One is a bit sexier, in my opinion)

i admit it, i fell victim to the adds with Scarlett, and kind of figured, if it's sexy enough for her... this is one of those scents that i though that i really liked in the store, but after a little while it was just waaaay too sweet for me. it actually started off sweet but i figured the sweetness would fade after awhile and i was expecting it to change in the dry down. no luck.  make no mistake, i enjoy sweet scents like Prada Candy and Coach Poppy. but this one is a heavier/headier kind of sweet that also lacks depth. it seems rather one dimensional. it's not bad, but it's not something that that had me wanting to keep sniffing my wrists.  The One is not the one for me, but it might be okay on someone else. it is a little metal or alcohol heavy for me. i wanted sexy and feminine. but i didn't find it to be either. it's on the cold side vs. warm which i personally am not a fan of in a parfum.  the bottle is very nice and i'm giving points for that. it has a nice grip and would look lovely on a dresser/counter. ultimately i tried to live with it and wanted to like it but ended up returning it in the end. a little bummed.

This is a beautiful scent! It's soft and warm and a perfect pick-me-up on not so nice winter days. I've been wearing it on and off since December, and I think it's a fragrance that one could wear all year 'round. I tend to gravitate towards very citrus-y scents (which this definitely is not!) but have started experimenting with more mature, musky scents as I've gotten older. This really is the ideal perfume for me, except for one major problem: it does not last! Seriously, I put it on before work and can barely even smell it on myself by late morning. For the price I would like something that lasts longer than two hours. I want a perfume that can last me through the work day, and unfortunately that's not Dolce & Gabbana The One. I wish it did though, because like I said before other than that it's the perfect scent!
i've receive a lot of complements with this fragrance, everyone loved the smell.

reviews.review_title: Smells great, but not as strong as promised
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume and the saleslady promised me one or two sprays would be more than sufficient as it is very strong. I found this not to be the case at all. The scent fades very quickly, it's not worth the price you pay for a 1oz bottle.
I tried Dolce & Gabbana's the one as a free sample I earned with my Sephora points. I returned the next day and bought the full size bottle for myself and my daughter's we LOVE it!!!!!
Personally, no other fragrance can come near to The One. It's by far the best, most universally loved, sensual, exotic and inviting fragrance ever! It's a winner in every possible way!
This scent is so sexy and sensual and warm. Love it!
the service at the Sephora in the Westchester mall was superb and helped me find a wonderful fragrance. Thanks!

This scent has a subtle strength. I am extremely picky about my perfumes and this one is amazing. I don't buy perfume unless it is something that really grabs my attention. Looking forward to wearing it.

reviews.review_title: D and G the One is delish
reviews.review_text: This scent is very wearable casually or formally. Great combo of warm and sweet. It easily transitions from work to out and about for a special function.I received this as a gift from my husband for Christmas and it is the most often used perfume I now own. I wish he bought the bigger bottle...Maybe next Christmas!

I do!!! This scent is woodsy yet sensual. I feel sexy when I put it on, even if I'm the only who smells it... Always afraid to spray too much perfume. I love it either way. It's all about how you feel!

I have used D&G rose the one in the past and was trying to decide on a new scent for winter and discovered the one. I love the way this fragrance smells! I normally never get too excited about any fragrance and have never been able to find a signature fragrance until now. Love the warmth and vanilla tones. It lasts several hours w/o having to reapply, prob 5-6 hrs with 2 squirts which normally gets me thru the majority of my day. Will wear for a long time!

I tried this as a sample and asked for it as a Christmas present a couple months later. It's a nice, warm scent that makes me feel confident and sexy. I tend to reserve it for date nights. I have far too many fragrances, but this makes my top 5.

This is my go-to fall/winter fragrance. I normally shy away from vanilla or anything with the word oriental attached to the scent description, but this is amazing. When you first spray it, you get that explosion of mandarin peach & then as it developes into this rich, earthy smell. It's gorgeous & well done.
The One is a fragrance that will evoke a feeling of a old-school movie star with a new twist. You have to smell this scent to get the ideal.

I got a deluxe sample of this as one of my rewards. It smells very sweet when it's first applied, you definitely get the fruity notes. They don't last long, and then it just fades into powdery vanilla musk obscurity for me. It's not a bad scent, but it's not a very memorable one either. The warmth would work well for cooler temps as a daytime fragrance.
This is a sexy scent perfect for date night. I get compliments each time I wear it.
I love certain perfumes and I'm pretty picky. I love The One, I also love Burberry Body and Lacoste Touch of Pink.
on my third bottle of this- LOVE - sexy, adult, womanly, voluptuous......need I say more?

I received a sample & really wanted to like this scent, but in a nutshell, my daughter says I smell like a marshmallow and I have to agree. Unfortunately, this one doesn't work on me. Great staying power though!

I am a perfume fanatic...if I find one I like, I have to have it but there are only a few that I LOVE! This is one of them. It is my new absolute favorite. I can't stop smelling it!! It lasts all day too. It is amazing. Totally a great buy. Now I am going to buy the travel set so I have one in my office, purse and car!

I love this scent. I chose it as a 100-point perk and loved it so much I made sure to buy different things separately just to get more bottles! I purchased the Sephora atomizer to dump the bottles into in order to spray it on. When it all runs out I'm going to have to buy a bottle. And not only do I love it, the boyfriend approves, too. It is very soft and flowery, much like the powder scent that others are referring to, but it lasts and lasts on my skin, but it may not on others. It is classy and sexy without being too stiff and formidable, a very touchable sort of scent.

Got a sample of this as a 100 point perk, its nice but just not for me. I tried it 2 times and it is just to powdery on me. Some people might be ok with that but it gives me headaches. I wanted to like this but it just didn't work out will stick with the light blue.

reviews.review_title: The Scent I've Been Waiting For
reviews.review_text: I am 45 years old and have been looking for my perfect perfume for years. Either I find perfumes too sweet, too florally, or too spicy. This is a perfect balance of floral and spice.
I love this scent and it is lightly musky but still has a wonderful freshness that is perfect for winter.
i love this perfume! usually switch back and forth from this and another fragrance that i love....last a very long time and always get compliments!!

This perfume is The One that I love!. This perfume is cozy it smells like caramel and amber with subtle hints of floral. It is a very sweet scent and i love sweetness, so if you don't like sweet then this is not for you! It's very long lasting and you only need a few sprays. I think this scent is good for winter because it has that cozy/warm scent, but definently not a summer scent in my opinion. overall: LOVE.

I have been lusting after this fragrance for months! The One is simply... the one for me. I've never smelled anything like it -- very unique and sultry, and the touch of citrus just lifts my spirits instantly. Before I purchased my own bottle, every time I'd go into a department store or Sephora, I would douse myself with this perfume when no one was looking. It cost more than I thought I should pay for a perfume. However, last week, I received a $15 reward card from Sephora and guess what the first thing was I decided to buy?? You got it -- I practically ran to Sephora and snagged myself a 1 oz. bottle of The One (parfum... because it lasts longer than toilette and contains less alcohol supposedly). It's now waiting for me under my Christmas tree... and I'm having a very hard time resisting it. Think I just may have to break down and open it for Christmas Eve. I can't explain the effect this perfume has on me. I instantly feel like my identity has been upgraded! It makes me feel posh and confident. Just swoosh by some guy and let the fragrance waft through the air and linger there until he notices you.
I love wearing The One but find that it fades way too fast -which is why I bought the shower gel and lotion. Now it smells the way it should.
I just LOVE this perfume. Not only do I love the scent but others who smell it on me apparently do too because I get compliments quite often . . . even from complete strangers!
This smells like baby powder on me. Disappointing and expensive. Should have chosen something else.

So my birthday is coming up wtih plans of a new bottle from my husband so I have been researching, reviewing and smelling every scent in sight the last month (thats just my personality!)...  Yesterday I tried this at the store and it litterally stopped me in my tracks with the word wow coming out of my mouth. This one really stood out from the crowd of oh so similiar scents out there.  Someone on here in thier reivew called this scent 'warm and sugary' and I could not agree more. Its like a warm sugary kiss on a cold day...beautiful!  Oh also I sprayed 1 wrist in the late morning and by 10pm I could still smell this on me.  I just wish the bottle was a little more pretty and femine but it is a very D&G look...  This is the perfume I will get for my birthday!
Not as big a fan of this one as I wanted to be. It'a a little cloying after awhile. I generally like Dolce & Gabbana's perfumes but didn't love this one.
Absolute favorite fragrance. I always get compliments when I wear this. Very classic, sexy and timeless.
Awesome fragrance that lasts very long and develops nicely. A winner!
I have been looking for the perfect sent and this is it! I love this sweet, a little musky, very sexy. I just love it!
This scent is so sexy! It smells rich and intoxicating...not too sweet, but sweet enough to be girly with a light musk...mmmm

I wore this for the first time in a while today. The weather is cooling off and it felt appropriate. I walked into someone's office and said Wow, it smells good in here!. It wasn't until I went back into my own office and still smelled the sweetness that I realized it was me! I smell great! :) This scent is a bit heavy and musky, so be sure not to over do it. With just the right amount, this is a sophisticated, pretty, cool weather fragrance.
This is a wonderful addition to my fall/winter fragrance collection. My only regret is that I didn't get it sooner.

I love this perfume. It would earn a full 5 stars if it had more staying power. There si NO vanilla smell to it which is a huge plus for me as it seems that most of the current perfume favorites have lots of vanilla. This is woodsy and oriental.
It has a musky yet sweet smell. love it cuz it last all day long.  This is The One.lol
This was a gift from my husband as an apology after a fight :) It smells really romantic and delicious. I would recommend it for a romantic evening!

I really don't know how to describe this scent. It is nothing similar to other fragrances that are out in the market. It's very mellow yet somewhat strong; but not to the point where your head starts aching. I can generally smell a sweet vanilla infused with flowers. My favorite perfume Light blue, will work great all year round but I think The one will work well with fall or winter.

i can't rave about this one enough, even with the hefty price i will never live without it. it defines a sexy woman, with the wooden notes and the oriental feel to it this fragrance just makes me feel sensual and sexy. my boyfriend absolutely loves it, got me my first bottle actually. love the packaging, only thing is when you spray it some gets on the top of the bottle as it's square and oddly shaped. this is the ultimate scent and i adore it.

This fragrance is so classic, elegant, womanly, and always sexy. I always get compliments on this and keep going back regardless the latest scent that I want to try. This is so beautifully subtle and long lasting that I like to layer it with other scents that don't last so long for a subtle change.

It's THE ONE and would definitely recommend! Subtle and feminine, and very sexy fragrance. My gay buddy recommended it to me and I thank him for that! I get compliments every time! The scent trails with you all day!

I went into Sephora yesterday looking for a new signature scent. My tastes are eclectic, but I was looking for something beachy. I had thoughts like old-school Coppertone, jasmine, vanilla, coconut, but nothing too fruity or sweet. Every time I picked up something I thought I'd like (after reading online reviews), they were too fruity, or smelled like candy.  After describing my impossible list to one of the women who worked there, she suggested The One. It's a little more powdery than I was expecting, but it was perfect. Like a quasi-beachy scent for someone in their 30s. Perfection! I wore it to work the next day and received tons of compliments!
I love the scent once it wears off a little, otherwise it's just too strong and makes me sneeze. It smells like other perfume that I have. Nonetheless, it's still a nice scent.
this fragrance is perfect for the summer .. perfect for any occasion smells fruity .. its class in a bottle!!!

I was wearing hypnotic poison from Dior for a long time and I love vanilla. The One from D&G is sexy, not to sweet, and smell amazing! It has a lot of personality and people stop me to ask me what perfume I'm wearing. You rill be charmed by it! Enjoyue405

Pretty amazing..I got this product for my mother and I want to make her happy this certintly made her happy becuase she likes perfumes that are never sweet and notto woody. This is just perfect ReCOMMenD!
I love this. Smells fantastic and when combined with the lotion, will last all day with no problems.

reviews.review_title: SENSUAL, SEXY. WARM AND LONG LASTING
reviews.review_text: Dolce & Gabbana The One is a beautiful Oriental inspired fragrance. It has a symphony of notes and changes beautifully until it fades away. I've sampled this a few times, and plan to buy a bottle when I finish one of the fragrances I've been currently using. I like most of the ingredients with the exception of musk and Vetiver (?), but those are so well blended that I don't notice them. This isn't particularly heavy, but is more sensual and warm, and lasts a significant amount of time. If you're looking for an extremely sexy fragrance (per my husband) you might want to check this one out.
Naked and very elegant. That's how The One makes me feel. It's subtle and feminine and dares others to ignore you. They won't be able to.
i just love dolce and gabbana the small doesn't last that long but i still love it...

I was turned on to this scent by a girlfriend of mine whose husband bought it for her. When we went out, I asked what scent she was wearing and she offered let me wear it. I got so many compliments on it. It's a nice deep, musky scent with hints of floral. Soft, but noticeable. Everyone loves when I wear this, especially my husband. I'll sometimes catch myself sniffing my wrists when I wear it, just because I love this scent.
Absolutely love this perfume! I just bought it for my wedding and honeymoon. It's got a great floral scent but it's not overpowering like flowerbomb. Luv, luv, luv it!

This scent is beautiful! I absolutely love it and wear it for romantic date nights. It smells very warm on my skin and is very soft but long lasting. It smells a bit powdery as it dries down, which I don't really like, but I know a lot of people do which is great. My boyfriend also loves this scent on me, so it passes the guy-friendly test! Overall a definite winner in my book.

This scent has become my ID card since it first came out. It's ideal for every season, especially for the evening. It's not sweet or overwhelming, which I love, but sensual and quite unique. By far my fave today!
This perfume smells good...it really does, BUT it does not last very long. Had it been longer lasting, I would not have had to return it.
I fell in Love with the soft and subtle nature of this fragrance. I even got the male version for my hubby. Mom however loves it more than I do, so my 'the one' ended up in her house :D
This is a very soft clean smell.... Even people that have allergies to perfumes can be around this perfume. I have gotten tons of compliments when wearing it.
I was looking for a new scent and found this in the store after testing a few. This is light, sexy and good for day or evening. Thanks Sephora for having the best brands!
this perfume is sensual, warm and a little sweet. it lasts all day on me but be sure not to overdo it; it can get overpowering when applied too heavily.
I love this perfume. I get compliments on it .
I just started using this parfume and it is one of my top favorites. It is smooth and sensual. Very Nice.

Quite possibly the best fragrance I've ever used. I love the way this smells on me. I tried the purse spray because I was unsure, but I think I'm going to opt for the perfume for more lasting power next time. Very feminine, yet not over-powering. Pricey but well worth it.
if your looking for a sweet but soft perfume this is the one. i love my dolce and gabbana. i receive compliments of my friends and other people every day. its a great fragance. great price.

I am a self professed perfume addict, I think smeling good is essential to feeling good. I got a sample of this perfume at sephora and when I used it, I just felt pretty. After my sample was done I bought a bottle and I love it. It's great for everyday wear to work and also perfect for special occasions. The perfume also lasts awhile, and if I out it on in the morning I can still smell it in the afternoon. I am very happy with this product.

I love Dolce & Gabbana The One, it smells so GREAT!! I just purchased it for the first time, before I used Chanel Tendre. This perfume smells AMAZING! It has a sexy, delicate, feminine smell to it. Something that you could wear everyday or to a big event. This is my first day wearing it & I have already got so many compliments on how great I smell, and people asking me what I'm wearing. It is a little expensive but it is definitely worth it!

This perfume was so pretty. Feminine, light and great for summer. I give it four stars for two reasons. 1) It was very expensive, the 1 oz bottle cost $63. 2) it didn't last as long as I would have liked. I sprayed before work and needed to reapply by lunch. Other than that, very nice.
Don't get me wrong. I love this perfume. The only problem is that it does not last long, which I have found most of D & G perfumes are (at least what I have). Other than that, it is very nice one.

I love Dolce & Gabbana The One, it smells so GREAT!! I just purchased it for the first time, before I used Chanel Tendre. This perfume smells AMAZING! It has a sexy, delicate, feminine smell to it. Something that you could wear everyday or to a big event. This is my first day wearing it & I have already got so many compliments on how great I smell, and people asking me what I'm wearing. It is a little expensive but it is definitely worth it!

reviews.review_title: Not for me, but still smells good
reviews.review_text: Warm, oriental, and very sexy. This is the signature scent of my favorite Aunt and I rather like it for her. But not for me. It just doesn't fit my style. But it is very special, in that it is not like any other perfume.

smells amazing, thinking of it as my signature scent now! I usually go for the more fresh type perfumes not the warm, but this one is just the right amount of warm with fruity tones. Recommended for even the fresh perfume lovers!

I got this fragrance as a gift from a French friend. Out of all the great French perfume that could've offer me she picked this one. She mentioned that this was selling very well in her perfumeries in France. I liked it, and although I always very appreciative a friend gift, I didnu2019t love it.
When I was 18 I was looking for a new signature scent. I wanted a go-to perfume that I could wear daily. I walked into Macy's and found The One. It is perfect for me! I love it. It just oozes glamor!
Absolutely delightful, and can be worn day and night. Long-lasting and a scent that will smell great on many people.

I am not an oriental fragrance kinda girl, but this fragrance is just too amazing to not wear. I can smell the peaches/citrus in there, but then you get a wave of sensual notes afterwards....this fragrance is so sexy!

reviews.review_title: wish i could smell it all day
reviews.review_text: perfect blend of fresh floral and sweet unique oriental. only 4 stars because the scent doesn't last as long as I would like. never lasts more than a few hours which i find very annoying.

i got this as a gift last x-mas (i never mentioned that i wanted it, my fiance read my mind!) and it is awesome! it's sexy yet refreshing. also it's not heavy like other oriental florals so it doesn't give me a headache like some other stronger & mature scents.
This is my absolute favorite fragrance. So elegant!
This fragrance actually smells golden. The vanilla undertones keep the scent warm and the floral under control. It's a very modern scent.
I don't wear this but my mom does, it smells amazing on her but it's a little mature for me. Unique scent, not many scents like it. Great!
Soft, sensuous and absolutely beautiful without being overwhelming or loud. I wear this fragrance and my friend begged me to get her some so I bought this for her as a gift.
I bought this on a whim. Not sure it's my favorite scent ever. Maybe a little too sweet?
this perfume is what you are looking for, warm, sultry, classic and sexy. Totally classic and perfect for every season, not overpowering but alluring.

I bought this because it was reccommended if you like Armani Code and it really didn't live up. It's very flowery and powdery. I like a little edge to my fragrance and this has none at all. If you like your scents very soft it may be for you but it didn't match up to what I wanted
This is a scent for a woman. I love a variety of fragrances but right now I truly need something like this. It is sensual and sexy and does not take much at all. Go for it ladies.
I love the smell of this perfume. Lasts all day long and I think it is great for all seasons! I can't stop smelling it!!! Delightful!

There isn't much to say about this smell, other than it's amazing! It's rich and light at the same time. I get hints of floral and musk, and it's a scent that linger with you for the whole day. This review probably wasn't that useful, but trust me, it's such a lovely scent!!

I am drawn to anything that is described as oriental...and then sometimes they work for me and other times they smell horrible. I actually smelled this in store before ever reading a description for it and fell in love. It is so sexy and classy. And it's not too heavy to wear in the daytime as long as you don't go overboard. On me, the dry down definitely rings of musk, so if you hate musk you might want to skip this scent. I also get a bit of that 'powder' smell in the dry down...nothing like Chanel No. 5, but interesting nonetheless since I wasn't expecting it. When I bought it it had been awhile since I smelled the perfume in person. I spritzed it on and it wasn't what I remembered...and I actually wasn't fond of it immediately. But after about 20 minutes of it being on me, I fell in love with the scent again. This is now my signature scent and I get tons of compliments on it! Lasting power is moderate. Doesn't fade within a couple hours, but also doesn't last all day on me...unless I spray it on my clothes.

This scent is one of my all-time favorite perfumes. It's warm, sexy and feminine, and genuinely LASTS all day - I will smell the scent lingering hours after applying! It has staying power yet is not too strong or overly offensive, and every time I wear it I get compliments on how amazing I smell. It's musky and sweet with a hint of floral and can easily transition from day into night. Also, I think this scent mixes well with just about everyone's chemistry- I've smelled it on a variety of women and it's gorgeous on every single one of them! A must-have.

I don't know what to compare this with or what category to put this one in e.g. floral,fruity etc. I just know that it is one of the best in a long time. And it just takes a very small amount too. Which makes me love it even more.Last all day no complaints here this is a WINNER for sure!
I spritzed abit of this on while visiting a friend, and vowed to get it for myself. I never buy myself perfume, so that is saying a lot. It's heady, musky, very seductive I think.

I sampled this in a magazine and thought for sure I found my soul mate. I went out to buy it, but it turned on me once it was on. That surprised me because most fragrances sweeten on me after a while. So, try it first. I hope it works on you because it is such a warm and alluring scent - I think of eating fresh peaches in the warm summer sun.
I first smelled this in Japan at duty free, and had to buy it! When you first put it on it's a bit floral but as it settles on the skin it becomes a little powdery. It's lovely.
love, love, love the scent but it doesn't last long

This is lovely, it really is. I fell in love with it from tester strip to my own skin, as it matches very nicely with my chemistry. Unfortunately, after three or four hours it was gone. Gone! I don't have dry skin, so I'm not used to fragrance just fading like that. For as much as it costs, it should really stick around a little longer. Still gets four stars for how beautiful it is.

reviews.review_title: The only perfume I ever wear......
reviews.review_text: D&G The One is absolutely captivating! It is one of those perfumes that lingers lightly ... it is not overly offensive ... it does not slap you up side the sniffer if someone happens to walk through your path once you've gone. Every time I wear it, the guys at work pass by my office saying my husband is one lucky man to have a sexy-smelling wife like me! :) The fragrance lasts all day without leaving an oily residue on my skin but again is not overpowering. It's not one of those fragrances that fades as the days wears on....it's subtle with all-day staying power. It's slightly sweet but not in that floral too sweet way....quite delightful!

This is my favorite perfume. It's great for everyday use or dates. It leaves you feeling sexy and confident. I really love the vanilla accents...they make it feel really cozy and approachable but still sexy. It's not strong or overpowering at all. I usually have a hard time with perfumes but this one is great.
My absolute favorite. Subtle sweet smell that you'll fall in love with.

I am not a big fan of perfume. Anything too overpowering always gives me a headache. But this is not the case with D&G. I LOVE this perfume. I can wear it in small amounts and it lasts all day without giving me a headache. Plus, it smells amazing!
I love this perfume. It smells amazing!

I am a fan of all Dolce & Gabbana scents..but this one was a favorite. I first saw an ad and fell in love with the scent and finally got it. I wear it often and get compliments all the time. I wear this more in the winter/fall & the light blue in spring/summer.
This perfume is amazing! it smells so good and i just can't believe the quality of it!
A very sweet but not overpowering smell. I love the dry down of this fragrance. It's soft slightly oriental, but not overpowering. It lasts the whole day. And my husband loves when I wear it.

I had to stop by for this perfume. It's one of the best out there. Probably one of the very few scents that make me act crazy over the girl that is wearing it. You feel near heaven with this one. This is definitly the perfume that does the rest when you aren't wearing something tailored. You know, thight jeans and thight top but the perfume is pretty subtle and you want to stay. I wish this perfume was unisex.

I just tried this perfume on today and fell in love with it. Most perfumes don't work with my skin, but this one was perfect. It's sweet, sexy, musky, floral... it's everything amazing in a perfume! Hopefully I'll get this for Christmas :)

reviews.review_title: Absolutely in Love with this Scent!!
reviews.review_text: The One is the first scent that I love the whole body of the fragrance. Note after Note it is a beautiful blend that lasts throughout the day with amazing vigor!! My #1 scent for Day and Night!

when i first sprayed this perfume i didn't really like the way it smelled, but once it settled on my skin i fell in love with it. i walked around all day sniffing my wrist. i know people probably thought i was crazy but i just couldn't resist. love it!
Since I tried it the first time I just love it. It blends with your natural aroma

Ignore the haters of this perfume! This has a LONG staying power and is not overpoweringly floral/sweet. It is warm and sensual. If you are used to milder perfumes that can fade quickly then this is not for you. But if you are bold and want a bold signature scent than this is it. My guy friends LOVE it as well as my girlfriends... !
This is pleasant fragrance that is feminine and not overwhelming. It's a great daily perfume that would be appropriate for the office yet nice enough for a date.

Favorite perfume EVER! My problem with a lot of perfumes is that they smell like, well, perfumes. Even really nice scents still have that kind of alcohol-y smell that says This is a perfume! But this doesn't. I have other scents that I like a lot as well, and when I use them people will say they really like my perfume or ask what it is I'm wearing. But when I wear The One I get a lot of people just telling me I smell good and not seeming to realize it's perfume at all! So yeah I find that cool. I guess if you're a person who doesn't usually like perfumy smells you might consider this, it's really great!

reviews.review_title: this scent was made for me
reviews.review_text: i say it was made for me because i feel so strongly about this parfum.its so rich and intoxicating.very sophisticated . i immediately feel confident and soothed when iwear it. this is a show stopper of a fragrance,very unforgettable and delicious. you definitely want this fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Warm and sweet - good winter scent
reviews.review_text: This perfume opens with sweet/warm notes of fruit masked with more vanilla/amber. As it dries, it smells less of fruit and more of warm and sweet amber/vanilla. It is strong and has great staying power; the actual scent does not change very much from the time you put it on to when it dries. I would only wear this perfume in the winter because it's too strong and warm smelling for the summer. I imagine it would be comforting and lovely in the winter but only one spray for me, as it can be overpowering if sprayed on too much. Overall, job well done.

This is a scent that I will never live without! I get compliments every time I wear this scent! It is very clean and classic and not at all overwhelming like most. I do not get a headache while wearing it which most strong perfumes do to me. Fit for young and older women! My daughter loves it and she is 24. I am 44!

This fragrance is just too sweet and pretty for me. I don't get any musks or amber, I just get sweet, screechy florals that continue to assault you like a rap on the head. If you normally crave dark, woodsy scents, like I do, you would do well to steer clear of this one.

This perfume glides easily from day to night. For a person who can sometimes has allergies to perfumes, this perfume does not bother me at all. What I Iove about it is that when you walk past people, you can see it in their eyes that they are thinking..wow,she smells good. I love the impression and the signature scent it leaves behind.
Very, very nice fragrance!! I love it!
Very, very nice fragrance!! I love it!
I love the one - it smells lovely and lasts. I tend to use this or ironically michael koors standard fragrance. Dolce is always a nice one that makes you feel like a lady.
I love the scent! It's very bold and yet sensual at the same time! I was nervous at first with the uniqueness of it, but I ended up really enjoying it when I wore it.

Those interested, I would recommend trying this on the skin. When I initially smelled this fragrance on a a paper strip in a magazine, I was disliked it. Just not impressed.  Then I got a sample and decided to give it another try. It smells totally different from what I initially smelled. I like it!  I would describe The One as a light oriental floral. It's a warm oriental scent but not heavy at all. I personally don't get much of the fruit ingredients except maybe the peach. I think the dominant ingredient is a creamy vanilla over a light amber and clean musk. Otherwise, the ingredients seem to blend into each other very well. This is a mature, sweet, and feminine fragrance. It's slightly heavy for daily summer use. I prefer wearing it during the evening. When I have it on, I find it irresistible.  I think you will like this is you enjoy scents like Narcisco Rodriguez for Her, Tom Ford Black Orchid, and Donna Karan Cashmere.
smells lovely, fades to a nice woodsy floral over a few hours, and the scent lasts all day
Got this as a gift for Christmas and absolutely loved it! It's long lasting and it's not a heavy over bearing scent. It's perfect for daytime and night time.

reviews.review_title: beautiful smell,wish it lasted a bit longer
reviews.review_text: I love the way this smells. It is so sexy and feminine. I only wish it had more staying power. When I wear it I do get many compliments. I am going to buy the lotion and see if layering the lotion with the perfume makes it last a little longer.

I love The one. It is subtle but you know it is there when you move. I get a lot of compliments when I where this. I like this one even more than The One Rose. This scent can take you morning to night. Just lovely.
Dolce & Gabbana's The One is the best perfume! It has the sweetest, most beautiful-smelling, and long-lasting scent.

Nice scent. This scent on me smells best after it's been on me for a little while. Initially I didn't like it when I tested it in the store. But after I got home, it got my attention and I was haunted by it. Only problem was, i tried another perfume and couldn't remember which one was which....so back to Sephora. It was THAT haunting for me, but as I mentioned it didn't work for me until it was on for a while and mixed w/ my own chemistry. It has good lingering fragrance, and can be too strong/ overpowering if applied too heavily.
This is my second bottle of The One. I just love it. I do use other perfumes but this is a favorite of mine. The design of the bottle is so pretty, looks great on display.

I've been wearing D&G the one for 4 years and I don't plan on changing and time soon. It has an amazing fragrance that is not overpowering and last ALL DAY. I have never had so many compliments on my perfume before, from men and women alike!
love the perfume and get compliments. but the price...$92.00??? Really???
this scent is absolutely ultra feminine, its divine has the essence of romance and love

I've often considered making this, or one of the other D&G The One variations, my signature scent. It's warm and sexy, and still fresh and a little tart, all at the same time. It's thoroughly unique, and it's a very invigorating smell. This perfume really wakes you up. Perfect for any age.
This perfume smells great and is reasonable for a designer. Stays on all day long!
I bought this for my boyfriend not realizing it was designed for women. Smells yummy but not feminine so it worked for him...he fell in love with it and still doesnt know its for women!

this is actually my second purchase. my mom noticed the scent when i was walking by her and fell in love with it. she pretty much stole mine and had to buy another one. i often get a lot of compliments on this more than the light blue.
I love this fragrance! It's warm and sexy but not too heavy.
Smells fantastic but I wouldn't say it's made for the ultimate diva. Very light and sensual and great for everyday.

I recently purchased this great scent after going into Saphora for another perfume I had been wearing. I am not big on the BIG FANCY named items because, let's face it,I just don't always have the luxury of spending that kind of money often. I must say though I really like scents a little lighter and softer in the summer, this is a good pick and in my opinion. I can't tell you how many tomes I get someone asking me what that wonderful perfume is your wearing. At least take a moment and have the sales people make you a sample to take with you. This way you can have it in your purse or bag to see for yourself without making a full purchase to see if its a good scent for you to.

i absolutely love this fragrance. i have to be careful not to use a lot of musk so the fact that this has a bit of heaviness to it is nice. it reminds me of end of summer romance. one thing i'll say is even though it's a parfum, it doesn't last like a parfum should. i feel like i have to continuously spray this on me which is a waste of product
Great scent but doesn't last long even though it is an eau de parfum not cologne.

I love the smell of this. It's warm and sensual. Feminine without being too girly. Only reson it didn't get 5 stars is that it doesn't last too long...I've noticed this with other D&G scents...so i bought the mini version to keep in my purse!!
Very nice scent, not overbearing. Had to reorder this one!
I just got this for my mom for mothers day and Wedding anniversary and she loves it! It has a warm citrus mixed with floral scent that is great for summer nights!
This is a nice, sophisticated scent. Not too heavy or sweet, but with enough of a bouquet to get notice without overpowering. I feel pampered and very lady like when I wear this!
A very light and sophisticated scent.... the perfect touch!

The One is such a beautiful entoxicating perfume. It's light and not remotely cloying but it's memorable and people will notice it, in an entirely positive way. I love oriental and floral oriental fragrances and this does not disappoint. I don't have it (but only because I'm a perfume addict and I need to wait a bit with all the money I've spent to get it, lol) but I've tried it and I could not stop smelling my wrist. Everyone who smelled it on me said it was gorgeous. I'd recommend giving it a try and I'm absolutely adding this to my menagerie as soon as humanly possible. It's The One for good reason. To be honest I was brought in by the beautiful ad campaign with Scarlett Johansson, it just seemed like it'd be a classy fragrance and less juvenile, but I never thought I'd love it this much. Soooo delicious but not sweet per se. Well it has a sweetness but it's far from gourmand. You won't smell like a kid on a sugar high in this. Try it. :)

Love this scent! Its not overpowering. Its alluring & subtle. People ask me all the time what I am wearing for perfume, I always ask; is it too much & they say no, not at all & thats why they love it. This is a fragrance you can wear day & night! You may not even notice its stiIl there at the end of the day but it is softly lingering. I have purchased this for myselft twice & also given it as gifts.

Dolce and Gabbana's The One has to be one of the most scrumptious perfumes ever created, It's for the ultimate diva, one in a million, a woman who exudes confidence, class and a face one cannot question, alter or implore. No wonder they chose Gisele Bundchen as a muse for this.  The scent is long lasting, very modern and sweet in a less sugary but floral like way. Only one drop of this parfum and everyone in your presence will know that you truly are THE ONE.
I bought this before, back in 2006 and I finished it a while back. Finally I bought some more recently and I am so glad I did, I really love how it smells.
Best perfume! Graceful, quietly powerful, beautiful, not loud, over powering, adds to the beauty and grace in any woman.
i just love love love this fragrance it's me thats really all i can say. it's the most wonderful warm, oriental floral. LOVE LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!  Shaniza

Wow, Dolce & Gabbana's The One is one of those unforgettable fragrances that turns heads in a good way. This fragrance is soft enough to wear as a day fragrance and sensuous enough to wear during the evening. The vanilla blends beautifully with the mandarin, lychee, and peach for a soft and lightly sweet scent. The jasmine, amber, and vetiver round out the sweetness with some depth. The floral notes give the fragrance just a touch of softness. The best part about the fragrance is that it does not smell like most other floral oriental fragrances.
This fragrance is absolutely my favorite. I have gotten so many compliments since I purchased it. It is light enough to wear as a daytime fragrance but strong enough to wear in the evening as well.

I bought The One cologne for my fiancee at Christmas and it smelled wonderful so I thought I would try the perfume and it is wonderful as well. I get compliments on it all the time. It has a soft scent, not strong and overpowering.

reviews.review_title: The One - On Your Wedding Day
reviews.review_text: My fiance brought me a bottle of The One from duty free on a European trip. I usually like lighter fragrances, but this one is truly exceptional and although its got a strong personality, its not overpowering. I love to layer fragrance, so of course I got the lotion, shower gel - and even had a friend bring me the deodorant from Italy as you can't get it in the US. It was such a treat getting ready for my wedding...a long, luxurious bath using the bath gel, slathering on the body lotion, spraying the perfume...The One is my wedding fragrance and it always makes me feel special. Plus, I ALWAYS get compliments when I wear this - from my fiance, from women in shops, men on the street. This fragrance always makes me feel like a princess.
I received the perfume and lotion for Christmas. I was so happy to find the matching shower/bath. OMG, I smell fantastic. This is the way you should start your day. The scent is perfect for everyday.
I absolutely love this perfume!

I liked the citrus aroma and flowery fragrance combination. I normally am more of a woodsy kind of gal. I tried several different perfumes when I was in the store, but this perticular fragrance was full of fun and sefistication wrapped up in one and captured my attention.

Soft, sweet, floral, but with a warm, sensual twist. I love this scent to use on days when I do not feel like wearing the stronger other love of my mine, Flowerbomb. I use both scents, depending on my mood. If you like Flowerbomb, you may like this, too, just like me. Gave it only four stars because the scent does not last as long as I would like. But, perhaps it would not be as subtle if it were made to last longer? Don't know.

I saw this on my aunt's dresser and smelled it on a whim. I had never heard of this scent and, based on the heavy looking bottle, did not expect this to be so soft, light, and beautiful. It is floral and just a tad bit sweet, not at all overwhelming. When I wore it, my guy friends all commented on how good I smelled.
I've never had so many compliments about a perfume. It's musky, sweet and very sensual. It really smells sexy. It's a secret weapon of mine, especially on a date. You can wear it day or night.
Ahhhhhhhh this smooth sexy scent is just right and not too overwhelming. It give the aura of mmmmmm to the senses.
I love this frangance. It's a little expensive, but I get compliments on how good I smell often.
This has been my fragrance since it first came out...LOVE LOVE IT

Hey: This new perfume is off the hook. It smells wonderful and it ohhhh so sexy... I actually purchased a bottle for my boyfriend's mother for her birthday; I could not resist and buying a bottle for myself.

Great scent! I thought it was my favorite, but I prefer the L'Eau The One to this original! The original is just too strong and too much for my taste, unless used lightly. If you are looking at this perfume because you like Light Blue, check out the other The One... or just in my opinion!  This does smell yummy, but just not as much as the lighter and newer version!

I did not prefer this fragrance at all. I really did not need anything new, but the description sounded so perfect for me I decided to order it. I would have been better testing it in the store because you never know how it will really smell on you.

This is my new signature scent! The One is a beautiful blend, not at all too strong. It's a scent that will compliment you, instead of overwhelm everyone once you step inside a room. To me, it smells like a slightly powdery floral.

By far my most used perfume, I love it so much!! It might be slightly too strong for day time especially if you're younger, so I don't use it as much in the morning but I have it on every time I go out. Whenever I hug someone I usually get asked what it is I'm wearing and told how good it smells. You won't be disapointed in this!
quick, easy and fun... everyones helpful...
Smells great....lasts for a while, but not as long as I'd have hoped.
my boyfriend LOVES this cologne. its a bit small but simple
Love this scent. It's fresh and flirty and I think it has some kind of vanilla hints to it. Very warm and sugary smell - I love it!
Feminine, Beautiful and not overpowering like so many can be. Just perfect for me, a lovely scent but not like my grandmothers or like a kids.
My new favorite perfume. I always wore Donna Karen Cashmere Mist. This is just as soft and sexy. I get lots of compliments every time I wear it.
This is totally my favorite perfum of all time!!Very lasting!!My friends and family members always asks what perfum am i using ,they loved this scent!!This smell makes me feel good and confident!!

I got this perfume as a Christmas present and have been in love with it even since! I wear it a few days a week and everytime I do, I always get tons of compliments and women asking what I'm wearing.  The Rose version smells equally as great but I prefer this one.
I am not into perfume, but this scent was perfect on my skin. I want to try the new one

I tried a sample and I loved it. I ordered the bottle and it's far more powdery than the sample was. It is, as they site says, warm and oriental floral, but I can't get past the powdery part. Powdery is not for me. It's a good, average lasting, strong scent. It's pretty, but it's not the one for me.

This fragrance is out of smell after 5 min of applying it on your body,and you have to be careful if it agrees with your chemistry it can stink realy bad. This was a gift and I was very dissapointed of the quality. If you are between choosing 2 parfumes,choose the other. This product is a ruin for the good name of D&G.
Love the smell of this perfume, however, it fades very fast and does not last on me at all. Too bad.

I love this because it has that warm classy super expensive scent! a fragrance with a strong personality- I couldn't agree more!!! I will always buy this. I got others but this one will stay in my vanity always!!!
This fragrance will definitely unleash your inner glamazon! :) It's strong but it lasts very long (unlike most perfumes) and the scent is just so sexy! I am definitely buying this again.
I'm allergic to most perfumes.And I have been looking for years for one I could were without getting headaches. Now I finally found one.
Best perfum ever made!
I know I took a risk buying perfume online. It smells nice, just not for me.
There is something very seductive about this scent. The scent wears quite long and I only need one spray.  At first smell, I could pick up a nice light night of lychee. It's a nice twist.

reviews.review_title: Smells delicious, but gives me a headache.
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing, it's the best floral I've ever smelled. However something about it gives me a bad headache and I end up scrubbing it off every time I wear it :( If you're not prone to perfume headaches than I'd say get it!
so feminine and so me it is a great scent and it mixes well with my body chemistry

Love this scent! glad i finally got it for my bday! At first was thinking that I should have gotten the one rose because it smelled softer but The One is not too overpowering. I love the subtle sweetness to it, I am usually a fan of white florals. The lotion is ok, its not as perfumed as others, still havent tried the shower gel. update to come
I love this perfume. Everytime I wear it, I get a ton of compliments. It is warm and seductive but not at all overpowering
i LOVE this SCENT!!! it's AMAZING

Dolce & Gabana is the one...the fragrance it got it going on..I wouldnt trade it for nothing else..can you say sofistication,sensuality and lots of head bobing back n forth..Its the best perfume ive gotten in a while.

reviews.review_title: The One is the only One!!
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume.. when someone is reminded of you.. thats everlasting.. i use The One and Chance by Chanel.. those 2 are my signature scents.

If you enjoy the original Marc Jacobs, Euphoria, Notorious, then you will love The One. The body lotion is lightweight, non-sparkly, and very fragrant so you could even get away with purchasing the lotion and passing on the perfume if you wanted to save some money for other goodies at Sephora :) Remember a little goes a long way.
Beautiful scent, I'm a big fan of soft floral scents but wanted something a little warmer for the winter and this fit the bill! Not overpowering or powdery
fabulous fragrant and just the right amount of scent for any occasion...i love it!! very vibrant and feminime smell..
Great perfume. i love it and recomend it to all women. specially when going out at night!!
Very nice fragrance. Kind of masculine. I get lots of compliments!
Love this. get loads of comliments. A different fragrance for me, and ill be back for more!!
Strong warm scent so it's good for the dry/winter season. May be too strong for the warm season so use with a light hand but still a pleasant scent.

I got the smallest bottle last year and loved it so much that I ran out really quickly, but I was disappointed when I bought a larger bottle and it smelled completely different and not nearly as delicious! I love this perfume but I would get the smaller bottle, maybe it is more concentrated or something.
I love this perfume. I makes me feel beautiful, and a little exotic.
The One is my favorite fragrance. I've been using for about a year and I get compliments every time I wear it. The scent is light, fresh with a slight sweetness (but not too much).
I love the scent. It is not over powering, It is light, but it makes a statement I would recommend this fragrance to my friends.
Not one of the best fragrances I own but it's not the worst. I dont think I would recommend it to anyone.
Amazing smell! It lasts for a while as well

I love, love, love this perfume! The first day I wore it, my husband, who never notices anything, said I smelled great! It's been years since he's noticed a perfume. I knew then I had kicked a fieldgoal! :)
I absolutely love this perfume. I got it for christmas and fell in love with it. Give it a try, you will not regret it.
This perfume smells heavenly. It is a sexy, modern fragrance, and gets a lot of compliments,
my favorite one from now on
I JUST LOVE THE ONE AND I WILL ALWAYS BUY IT . JUST LOVE LOVE IT!
Sephora, is one of my favorite stores to shop at, when looking for gifts and makeup as well at the perfume. Five rating
Soft and elegant. Has a definate presence but doesn't overwhelm. A good balance of sweetness and sensuality.

reviews.review_title: It is THE ONE to own
reviews.review_text: Love, Love, LOVE this scent. My boyfriend cannot keep his hands off of me!!!!

i was looking for a different scent that was both mysterious and fresh. this fragrance is flirty, classy and elegant. usually i just wear a heady scent when going out to party, but this one definately makes me feel all grown up, a certain distinguished air. all a lady needs to know is that this is a scent that can be considered timeless and classic while being a modern one. i love the musky sweet notes that is carries!

I never know which fragrance I will like as they usually smell different on each person and tend to fade or change scent as you wear it. However, on me, this smells great going on and continues to smell great throughout the day. It isn't very strong (I only put a couple of spritzes on) but smells sweet, but not over-powering sweet. It is more of an adult woman, smell that is alluring and magnetic. I use to wear Dior Addict and wanted something similar in smell but distinctly different and this is it. I spray it in my hair and when I brush my hair or move my hair during the day get a warm whiff. I really love this perfume and think it's appropriate for all seasons.
This perfume is very chic and sexy. I always get complimented every time I wear it. I reccomend it to anyone.
I can not say enough about this. It is by far the best perfume I have ever had. I stopped using Chanel Chance and wanted something new and different and this byfar exceeded my wishes!!
Warm scent that isn't overbearing. A great choice for colder, winter months!
This is not my regular scent, but everytime I wear it, I get compliments. Scent also stays on skin a long time.
was given as a gift - the person loves this perfume; this is the third time I have given as a gift to the same person.
My signature perfume. I have been using it for about 2 years and I get compliments all the time on how I smell. Very good product. Lasts a long time.
service was great...product is fantastic!
Really love the Dolce & Gabbana One fragrance. Light, but it's definitely there and gives off a very pleasant scent. Will definitely be purchasing more in the future.
This really was a good purchase, the floral combination with the fruity ingredients make this one an excellent fragance for any moment. I love it!
I smelled this in sephora and asked for it for xmas! My boyfriend picked it up and Loves how it smells! It's delicious and sexy.

I received a Sephora catalogue and in it came a sample of this fragrance, it was love at first sniff. I just had to have it! Although it was just a sample the scent lasted throughtout the day and so does the real thing. It is a warm, sweet smell and currently the only thing I ever spray before I go out!
Very satisfied This frangrance is very sweet yet seductive and sexy . I love it!!!!!
It was a gift, she loved it!
This fragrance is soft and pleasant. I have gotten Lots of compliments!

I really like this scent, it goes on very spicy then mellows to just a nice clean scent, BUT it just does not last. I feel like I need to spritz some on every hour, but I really do like the smell just wished it would last.
Another one of my favorites!
D&G The One leaves me smelling fresh and sexy! I LOVE this perfume.
Light and lovely. I purchased this less than a month ago and have had many requests for the name.

I love this scent! It smells great for any occasion! The only thing I don't like is that the scent doesn't last very long. I'm used to putting it on in the morning and still having some on me by evening. If you don't mind having to reapply, then this is great!

I love this fragrance! I know I'll be reordering soon, cause I use this several times a day. I ordered it as soon as I smelled a sample in a magazine, and I rarely if ever do that! This is for ALL Women in my opinion!

After reading the reviews describing this as a very strong perfume I thought Great! I've never had a scent that my nose wouldn't gradually adjust to; I smelled this ALL DAY. Seriously, I didn't think it was literally possible to smell something all day, but I now know it is. While it smelled amazing, smelling it with EVERY breath was too much. Oh well...
This smells incredible....so delicious.....love it!
I absolutely love this perfume. It has a sophisticated, elegant, sexy and captiviating scent. I spray twice on my body and the smell lasts throughout the day.

D&G The One is a one great fragrance. Floral but not too sweet or over-powering. Since fragrances are very personal, you need to smell it on yourself to appreciate whether this is a fragrance for you.

I just got my sephora catlogue wihich had the sample of D&G - the one and I am considering to buy this as a birthday gift to myself this December. The smell seems to be abit overpowering & strong. But the end notes are calming. Good for occasions like holiday season & parties.

I tried this new scent after receiving a sample of it. It's warm and soft and lasts a while. My boyfriend loves it so much he bought me a set so I could wear it even when I stayed with him. He said it's imprinted in his memory...when he smells this scent, he thinks of me.
it's exactly what the description says. you only need to spray like twice and you're good to go (it's kinda strong)
You can't even smell the perfume and mInd you I layered with the moisteriizer (which smells better). Huge Disappointment from Dolce & Gabbana.
This product smells delish and shipped super fast! Love it!

I received a sample of this perfume today in the mail, and I must say I'm quite impressed by it. It's sweet yet sophisticated and a great everyday perfume. This is something I would really consider purchasing in a larger bottle.
I get tons of compliments on this fragrance! I have a hard time finding perfume as I get migraines easily. This is one of the few that I can wear with no problem.
I can be sensitive to heavy perfume - but this one is perfect. Smells great without being too much. makes a good gift!

I got this as an early Christmas present, last year ( early as in on Christmas Eve), I wore it out on the 24th and the 25th last year to different holiday parties. Now, everytime I smell it, I am reminded of the holiday season. How lucky am I? I love it!

IM A BIG FAN OF G&G PRODUCTS, FROM SHOES AND CLOTHES, TO FRAGRANCES. THIS IS ONE GREAT BUY..ITS CLEAN AND WEARS A LONG TIME. IF YOUR MONEYS TIGHT, TRY BCBG GIRL. ALSO WEARS LONG AND SMELLS GREAT, BUT COST ALOT LESS..
This is a great fragrance...very clean and fresh!
I love this fragrance, it's one of my favourites. It is a stronger, heavier scent than I normally go for but I just love it. Every single time I wear it I get complimented ...Everytime!
I love D&G the one! It drives my boyfriemd wild and I get tons of compliments everytime I wear it. Highly recommended fragrance
was difficult to get a someone to help me.
I love this perfume and i get complements on it all the time!

This perfume has a really unique and sophisticated fragrance. The only problem I found with it was that it isn't an everyday perfume. I find it too bold to wear it to school or work. It also has an older persona to it. I might reconsider my opinion in 5 years or so?
I love this scent. Well worth the cost because people consistently compliment me on how good I smell
I have received more complements on this scent...all telling me how wonderful I smell!!!
This perfume was rated as #1 when I bought it. I don't think it is all that great. It is a bit strong.
I absolutely love this perfume. Guys go crazy for it too!!! Very sexy fragrance. It is now my everyday perfume.
i LOVE this scent plus it drives my husband WILD!!!!
I receive compliments all the time on this product. Makes people jealous! Buy it, enjoy it!
It's lovely. It's not overpowering, but has excellent staying power. I love that it's not too floral or too spicy.
OMG A SCENT TO HAVE
Smells great and is long lasting

Dolce and Gabbana's The One has to be one of the most scrumptious perfumes ever created, It's for the ultimate diva, one in a million, a woman who exudes confidence, class and a face one cannot question, alter or implore. No wonder they chose Gisele Bundchen as a muse for this.  The scent is long lasting, very modern and sweet in a less sugary but floral like way. Only one drop of this parfum and everyone in your presence will know that you truly are THE ONE.
Two words: Chanel Allure. D&G is slightly sweeter...other than that no difference...
OMG ! this gave me a headache- the scent was too strong, if you like mild perfumes this one is definitely not for you !

reviews.review_title: Ohhh my o my this perfume is amazing!
reviews.review_text: I can't get enough of it! I am so in loved with it. It lasted so long on me and I got so many compliments from day 1 of using it! It is so warm and nice!

This is an incredibly exotic scent for women. A perfect winter or evening fragrance. I love Hypnotic Poison by Dior, but I think this trumps it. It is definitely a stronger perfume than what I normally wear, but is so exotic and intoxicating it is worth being a little more daring.  The vanilla is nicely mixed with jasmine, amber and peach. I can't really pick up on the other scents, but the combination is a winner. A lot of perfumes with vanilla remind me of air freshener or baking, but this perfume takes vanilla to the level of champagne, candlelight and kissing on top of the Eiffel Tower.  Thank you D&G for giving me a new winter fragrance!
I think this is wayyyy too strong
I love thsi perfume. It makes me feel sexy and beautiful. It has a light floral scent but is definitely not too florally. It is a very warm scent. It is not overpowering at all. I love this perfume!
I have always been a fan of D&G and this perfume it is like the name of it THE ONE i will be using forever...Love Love Love
Lightly spray this one and you will instantly feel like a million $$$$$$. The scent is amazing, soft but beautful, warm and sexy.
This was a rather small bottle for quite a chunk of money. Furthermore, the scent, even with 5 simultaneous applications does not last all day. It is a nice scent nonetheless.
This perfume is great. Smells like how a beatiful natural woman would smell. Wish it would last longer tho..still, My fav!!

the one by Dolce & Gabbana is truly a winner my girlfriend loved it. its fragrance is quite sensuous its a unique and beautiful scent it was and excellent choice for a birthday gift or for any occasion for that matter. i scored major points with it so in my book its truly A WINNER p.s. the price is right also
this perfum is so sexy!! one of my new favorites!
It has a great subtle smell sweet. I absolutely love it.
Great, floral scent but not overpowering. Do wish it would last a bit longer.
Love the scent, but for an eau de parfum - the scent intensity is not long lasting. By mid morning I am missing the scent wanting more. That said, it's a great scent, so I have no regrets.
I usually wear Burberry Brit and bought this to try something new for summer. I was VERY disappointed, it just smells like baby powder on me.

Dolce and Gabbana's The One has to be one of the most scrumptious perfumes ever created, It's for the ultimate diva, one in a million, a woman who exudes confidence, class and a face one cannot question, alter or implore. No wonder they chose Gisele Bundchen as a muse for this.  The scent is long lasting, very modern and sweet in a less sugary but floral like way. Only one drop of this parfum and everyone in your presence will know that you truly are THE ONE.
This perfume is just okay. Smells a bit sweeter at home than it did in the store. Doesn't last too long.
I bought this for my recent wedding and I LOVED it! It stayed on all day and never was overbearing. I sniff the bottle everytime I see it! It has a very addicting scent to it...

It is the one for me. This perfume reminds me of Burberry Brit without the pepperiness, Dior Addict without the sickeningly sweet cloying quality, and BCBGIrls Sexy with less cinnamon.  My favorite perfume of late, and there are many, many I like. I can't say there are many D&G perfumes I dislike, but this one is really special. It may become signature scent for me. I sprayed it on a purse I carry around and was addicted to sniffing it all day. After that, I had to buy a bottle of this.  Warm sweet and sexy.

I came across a sample of this in a magazine and fell in love. Ive never found a perfume that suited so well. I recently purchased the perfume and wear it everyday. I may never go scent shopping again!

Been wearing it since it came out, and I know no other scent like it. It's light and powdery, yet not too sweet. The only thing I notice is that it does seem to fade faster than say, Angel, but that is a much stronger perfume. I love it.
i bought this for my mom, she loved it
Delicious, memorable, stays with you all day.

This was a birthday gift for my 89 year old mom who lives in a retirement home with my dad. She loves the Dolce and Gabbana fragrences and this one was no different. I have bought her the Light Blue for several years, but after she sampled this one, she loved it. It doesn't matter what age you are, you're still a woman. We love Sephora- especially for the samples that she can try, since she does not get out much any more. Thank you Sephora
Great fragrance and great service in the store!
This perfume smells so good, I just love it
This is a perfectly balanced perfume. A good balance of sexiness, muskiness, and wearability. It's good for all seasons, which usually is pretty rare for musky fragrances.
This fragrance offers what I love, a sexy, muskiness, but is more appropriate for the summer hear than most musky frangrances. Only downfall is the price for the amount you get...wish there was more!

I smelled this scent on a friend and was DYING to know what it was! When she told me it was the one by dolce & gabana I raced out to buy my own bottle! I LOVE this scent, it is sexy, alluring, and warm. It is different from most other contemporary perfumes, and definitely leaves you guessing. This one's a keeper!

The vanilla in this scent is very warm and enticing. I wear this scent in the fall/winter time but it's light enough to wear in the summer when I want to switch it up. It's a young adult smell in my opinion. It's light, new and refreshing with a mature aroma.
I love this so much that I had to buy another bottle to keep in my collection. Not sure how it smells on other people but it goes well with my body chemistry. This one is a keeper!
This is a great moisturizer, very lightweight. Plus it smells like my favorite scent, what more can I ask for. Love it.
i wear this everyday at work because it's long lasting and strong but not too strong. it's perfect for just about any location or occassion.

Dolce and Gabbana's The One has to be one of the most scrumptious perfumes ever created, It's for the ultimate diva, one in a million, a woman who exudes confidence, class and a face one cannot question, alter or implore.  The scent is long lasting, very modern and sweet in a less sugary but floral like way. Only one drop of this perfume and everyone in your presence will know that you truly are the one.

reviews.review_title: it really is the one for me
reviews.review_text: i am not a perfume expert and dont know how to describe the scent but all is know is that to me it smell heavenly sexy ,creamy...delicious!!!!! i really love it and will buy more when i run out....

My boyfriend bought this for me last month after sampling several scents. He said this one was very sexy and bought it for me. I have to say that I love this perfume, but only wear it in the evening, as I think it is a bit heavy for day on me.

Subtle, relatively long lasting, great smelling perfume. I just wish I didn't have to sell a kidney to buy a bottle. The men's equivalent is almost half the price. For now I'll stick to my sephora sample and other perfumes.

This scent is absolutely amazing. It is sexy, just what you would expect from Dolce & Gabbana. Family, friends, and every person that you have ever had contact with will compliment you when you wear this scent. The One is divine!!!!
LOVE!!!!!!!!!! IT FELT ORGANIC TO MY SKIN! FIT MY PESONALITY PERFECTLY
I'm a perfume junkie, but I'm very choosy with the perfumes I own. Once I took a smell of this I didn't have to think twice, I purchased it on the spot.

When I first smelled this, I absolutely had to have it. After purchasing and wearing it, I'm not as crazy about it as I initially was. I prefer it on me in the summer months, in the winter it tends to smell too powdery for me. It has a very unique smell, this is one that I'd definitely recommend trying before you buy.
this smells delicious
You'll love it. Feminine and sexy!
I love and adore this scent next GUCCI Flora.

After years of refraining from buying perfumes because I believed they were too wasteful, too expensive, not necessary, etc., this is the scent that broke me of that line of thinking. Some fragrances make you feel like you're a home, and that's what this does for me. When I put it on I feel like I'm wrapped in a cashmere sweater on a chilly day. Sweet with a little spice, warm but not sugary, extravagant but within limits, I'm glad that I bought this.
smells gr8. many compliments
I've been shopping for a new scent for a while now and fell head over heels for this fabulous perfume.  The bottle is a little awkward to spray, but once you smell it -- that just doesn't matter!
I bought this for my Mom's birthday and she loves it. The only problem is the weight of the bottle/ease of use in the shower. But she loves it and that's all that matters.
favorite perfume ever in my life!!!!

This is an absolutely lovely fragrance; it smells wonderful when you first spray it and keeps blooming. There is a sweetness to it, but not too much--just enough. I get bored with scents but this one feels like a keeper.

I bought this for my fiance for her birthday. With our wedding just two weeks away, I was looking for something special for her that wouldn't be a wedding gift as well. When I smell this scent, I think of our first kiss, star lit walks at night, the tenderness of her touch, and the warmth of her as I hold her close. It is her scent and it made the perfect gift!
This is by far the best perfume I have ever used. It is not overpowering and a little spray goes a long way. It is definitely worth trying out!
I love the smell of this parfum, and so does my hubby!
I have sampled many perfumes over the past year, but this is the only one I've purchased in a larger size. Light, yet exotic and sensual. It really is The One!
Favorite perfume of all time!
I find that the mixture of flora with sweet undertones to be just right for me. I find The One to be a little on the heavier side, but I still wear it during the day.
This is definetly the scent of your summer. It's light and fresh smelling.

I love this smell...sooooo sexy. I love to put it on before bed ;-) However...it doesn't last long at all. If I wear it throughout the day, I can barely smell it by the time I get to work (about an hour after I put it on).

Dolce & Gabbana's The One is a very nice fragrance that's not too strong, but not too subtle either. I usually don't wear perfumes with musk as an ingredient, but the peachy / floral scent overrides the musk whice makes a great combination. I would recommend sampling before purchasing.

This is another great perfume from Dolce & Gabbana. I love the original and this comes in as my 2nd favorite. It smells so expensive, but at $50 I think that is very reasonable. Their perfumes are very sexy so although I've worn them for day use, they probably are better for wearing at night.

This product can be used in the nail salon, or to a wedding. its pefect for ever occasion, and its not to strong, to floraly, or to musky. Its a very hard scent to describe, but its very attractive.  and gisele bundchen models for it !...which is one of the reasons i bought it..but then after wearing it for a while..i really began liking it more and more just smelling it throughout the day..and i get compliments

I'm not a fan of this perfume. There's a lot of hype about Dolce's The One and Light Blue. I didn't like Light Blue at all and never have so I figured I'd give this a try. Didn't wear well on me, started to smell funny after wearing it for an hour. The scent changed a lot and definitely isn't something I'll be keeping.
i prefer light blue over this one..
I sent this to my Mom in England for Mother's Day. I had used a tester prior to ordering it for her and loved it. Kind of powdery and not overbearing.
I really like the scent of this fragrance not overbearing at all, I received alot of compliments on the scent. I will purchase this again in the future.
The scent is long lasting it is great
Easy and fast--love shopping Sephora on-line!!
I love wearing this for a night out on the town! The warm sensual bite makes me feel so sexy I can't help but want to strut my stuff :)

reviews.review_title: this is The One for me!!
reviews.review_text: i love this stuff!!! it is not too strong, but strong enough to be noticed! the smell is super sexy! i will wear this smell forever!! ;-)
I ABOSLUTELY LOVE this perfume!! it's perfect for the day or night time and just simply smelss wonderful!!
I love this perfume! The scent is warm and beautfiul, but it doesn't last long. I have to keep reapplying it throughout the day. Love the scent, though.
I love the fact that this perfume is not too strong or flowery.

Dolce and Gabbana's The One has to be one of the most scrumptious perfumes ever created, It's for the ultimate diva, one in a million, a woman who exudes confidence, class and a face one cannot question, alter or implore. No wonder they chose Gisele Bundchen as a muse for this.  The scent is long lasting, very modern and sweet in a less sugary but floral like way. Only one drop of this parfum and everyone in your presence will know that you truly are THE ONE.
This is my new favorite scent! I must have it!
What beautiful, subtle perfect fragrance. Well worth the money.
it smells super sexy, lasts long, just pure scrumptious!

A tried this because of all the great reviews. But I didn't put it on and say 'That smells so good' and I've received zero compliments on the smell. I would say this perfume is a little to musky for me.
Subtil and elegant fragrance, I love it
I have made this my signature scent! It smells wonderful!
when you have a dinner out or just a stay at home night this scent is perfect. my husband loves the smell!
This is the most awesome scent I have ever purchased. I LOVE,LOVE it and will always have it. I know now why it is called THE ONE!

I don't care for strong fragrances, and often wear those from philosophy. But, I also wear and love Tova and D&G Feminine. Well, The One is terrific. It smells fresh, clean, and feminine. I also like the male cologne. D&G rocks!!
i love this perfume! is seems lacking only slightly in a strength. it has a soft ligth flowery smell. i do love it.
A very beautiful, subtle scent.
Its not called The One for no reason. This smells great!
I love the scent of The One and love the many compliments I've been getting since purchasing it!
Yes, this is the one perfume to wear. It is so sexy...makes me feel sexy because of the warm oriental floraly scent. Strong but not overwhelming.

I bought this perfume last year on a whim and fell in love with it as soon as I put it on. The scent is so warm and fresh...it is the perfect scent for all seasons. It is also so feminine, sexy and glamorous. I've got so many compliments on it. My roomate is also in love with this perfume and is planning on purchasing this very soon
I LOVE IT !!!! Smells great and stays on for a long time.
impressed with my purchase, service great, will be back to order again...

For a stong smell, this is also somehow subtle. It smells amazing and is just right without being overbearing. However, it does not last at all. I feel like I overpaid for something that stays on only 10 min. Perhaps thats what makes this not overbearing, but I would've loved if at least a subtle smell stayed on for a while. Because of this, i might not buy again.
This smells really nice in the bottle and when you first put it on but it really does not last more than an hour. There is no lingering scent that one would expect with a a perfume.
Yes, a modern sensuality fragrance with a warm powdery smell. . . . a nice change up.

Such a beautiful fragrance that unfolds beautifully on skin. A couple of sprays lasted all day, and I received countless compliments (from men and women) on how lovely it smells! The One Eau de Parfum and L'Eau The One are almost identical in scent, though L'Eau has a slight fresh twist (may be the added moss). Naturally, the Eau de Parfum lasted longer than the Eau de Toilette, because of the higher concentration of fragrance oils and less alcohol. Overall, they're both amazingly soft and sensuous, and if you like floriental fragrances, this may be one to try!
The first time I smelled The One..... I had to have it.

I was surprised that I liked this perfume more than L'eau the One, which I smelled first. I really like The One because it is stronger and lasts longer than L'eau the One. It lasts all day and doesn't fade! This perfume is a great oriental scent. It is sweet but definitely not too sweet, with rich, warm notes. It has a slight floral undertone, with warm vanilla and sweet fruity scents as well. This is a great pick for someone looking for a long lasting, oriental scent.
I really like this new DG. I have the orig and this is just as great! It's not to powering and I've gotten compliments every time I have worn this.
I love ( more like in love) with this parfum, I light and sexy, The man adores it and I get compliments eveytime I wear it. This has become must have !
This fragrance got really good reviews so I decided to try it. It is so strong and overpowering, gave me a HEADACHE.
ALOT OF COMPLIMENTS FROM BOTH MEN AND WOMEN. THEY EXPRESS HOW LOVELY I SMELL.

I was hesitant to purchase this perfume as I usually wear the Dior Addct assortment of perfumes and I love them. I am so glad I did purchase it. It has the best scent. It lasts all day. I can sometimes get headaches from perfumes, but not this one.  My only regret is that I wish I would have purchased the largest bottle of it.
