I received a sample of this when my sister bought some philosophy products. I sprayed it on this morning and I can still smell it on me. It seems expensive, but it's worth the price since it can last all day.
when I wear the one I feel very sexy and get so many compliments.

My mom recieved this for a gift from Italy one year and i got one smell of it and couldnt resist, i traded my chanel allure for it and now im hooked and on my third bottle. Irresistible! And i receive compliments all of the time, asking what i'm wearing cause it smells so good!
I absolutely love it!!! I'm usually a Hanae Mori kinda girl but this is great too. I've gotten a lot of complements.
This is a safe smell. I like it but it will not be my signature scent.
Perfect Fragrance- not too heavy but very easy to wear anytime, makes you feel beautiful
Great daytime perfume.. It has a warm and sweet smell, and most importantly it stays on!

The One is one of my two go-to fragrances. Personally, I think it's the perfect winter perfume, that can also be worn into the spring, and throughout the fall. It's got a sweet, full-bodied fragrance that isn't TOO overwhelming, and it's quality is really evident in how long the scent lasts.
really enjoy the perfume, have recieved lots if complements
Nice lastnig scent, that is just right. It's not too light and not too strong. It is a fragrance that will always have people conplimenting and inquiring what you're wearing. It is great investment.
I LOVE IT!!!! I finally found a perfume that stays with me and smells great!!!

This is totally my go to scent it has just a sublte hint of vanilla and is just such a warm woody scent!! Perfect all year round!!  It's one of those scents I've found that most either love or hate especially if sandalwood doesn't do anything for you.

I have tried soooo many perfumes BUT nothing like this one. I absolutely LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this one! It is Sexy, Sophisticated, Sweet, Casual, Feminine ALL in one. D & G really did it all with this perfume.
I bought this perfume after smelling the sample in a magazine. It is DIVINE! My boyfriend loves it.
My husband bought this for me on Valentines Day. As soon as he smelled it he was sold. He said that it smelled so Sexy! I agree. It doesnt smell like any of my other perfumes. Its strong and subtle.
This is probably one of the best perfumes I have ever purchased. I really enjoy the subtle scent and it is very versatile. I wear it during the day and at night.

reviews.review_title: I feel like a Southern Belle in the Springtime!
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous perfume. It is very rosy without smelling fake rosy. I feel elegant and carefree. Ahhh Bvlgari, I love you!

This perfume was made 4 me! Warm. Seductive. Sensual. Strong. I turn heads every time I'm wear this alluring fragrance. Not too strong, but definitely enticing!It gets me noticed. It draws you in. You want to look. Stare. Get close 2 me. I am irresistible. I am Captivating. I am...The One.
I love this perfume. I lasts long without having to reapply. I definetely recommend this perfume and the price is not all bad.

Absolutely beautiful scent, beautiful bottle. Sexy, but subtle enough for everyday wear. The yummy scent lingers without being overly strong. Obviously it's a bit of an investment, but I believe it's entirely worth it as long as you're not one of those people that douse themselves in their perfume (if you are, i suggest something less expensive) Love it! Decadent....

I so enjoy the Variety of fragrances Sephora has to offer and the samples given to us when asked to try a new scent . The ONE is Overall my favorite , smells delicious and stays on my person for long while.
This is one of my newer scents and is definitely one of my top 5. It smells great...goes on a little strong, but once it settles it is a beautiful scent that stays on for hours.

I received a sample of this a few months ago and just had to buy the product. It's a light, feminine scent with a sweetness that is great for summer, but can hold its own in the colder months. Great for someone who likes floral, but not overwhelming.

reviews.review_title: Sensual and warm...even in the dead of winter!
reviews.review_text: The peach and musk blend in perfect harmony to create a warm, sensual aura. There are no sharp or astringent notes, just warm and smooth oriental elements. I was sketchy about trying this, because I don't like Light Blue, but this is completely different. I'm loving this fragrance right now.

This is a beautiful and sensual scent. My husband bought it for me for Valentine's Day and couldn't wait to give it to me. Most fragrances give me an awful headache because of their potent undertones. It's so disappointing because each time I find a fragrance I think I'll love, I am unable to wear it. This product is nothing like I've tried before with it's soft and heavenly scent. I LOVE wearing this fragrance and I LOVE my husband's reaction to it!
I absolutely love this perfume. The vanilla note lingers and it is not overpowering, just sexy. It's not too sweet or flowery and is my new favorite perfume. :)
I love this perfume! It has a rich, warm scent but is not overwhelming in any way.

I think this is the best smelling fragrance I have tried in many years. I normally don't wear a lot of perfumes due to most of them don't agree with my sense of smell. I fell in love with this fragrance from day one when i found the sample in Elle magazine. I am on a low cost budget, for personal items but this was well worth the money.

I adore this perfume. After much searching for a personal signature scent, this is The One. Each and every time I wear it, I get multiple compliments and you can't beat that. It's feminine, sensual, and so unique.
Fabulous scent that instantly makes you feel glam! I'm not a one scent kinda woman but I could be with this!
it is too strong it gave me a headache

smells pretty@ 1st but once the top notes faded so did my liking of this fragrance. started to remind me of this bathroom spray i have @ work that i really don't like. i was disappointed to say the least.

I have many similar perfumes(Burberry, Prada, Obsession) but this one is the best. I have been searching for a new sent for a few years and this one with one spray lasts all day. It is sexy yet still appropriate for day. The vanilla note is not overpowering like it can be is some and the musk notes are so sexy I feel like a goddess when I wear it.

It has magical undertones, this fragance brings back childhood memories that are beautiful, and deep... my mother coming to kiss me before I went to sleep and she then she would go but fragance lingered!
This scent is really the one!!!! It has a signature scent that is very warm and sweet.
Its was a Christmas gift for my older daughter, She loved it!!!
This is one of my favorite fragrances. I always get compliments on it. Not to strong but just right and it last all day.
Great scent. You can spray it all over . Never smells like too much. I love it!
The sephora fragrance finder is so easy to use! the smell is wonderful and exactly what i expected.
Very light & fresh. Not overpowering. Got the body lotion. More bang for the buck.
I just love the smell of this.It's worth the money. I have had so many people asking me what I'm wearing and wanting to purchase there own

I got the lotion to accompany the perfume. It smells a little different (less strong) than the perfume, so it gives off more of a subtle frangrance. I wish the lotion were a little creamier. However, overall, if you love The One..you have to have this product!

My all time favorite scent is Miss Dior Cherie, but I had to find a new scent as I was starting to not notice it when I wore it. I first got this as a sample in one of my orders and I instantly purchased it after! When you first spray it it is VERY strong, but it gets subtle within the hour, and then it smells so pleasant and feminine. I love oriental fragrances, but this one is a very light oriental so if you like floral scent then you will probably like this.
I actually first smelled this in a sephora booklet, and immediately loved it and had to have it. Can be a bit overpowering at first, but once it tapers off it is fantastic
This is one of those fragrances that you get alot of compliments on. When you wear it you feel beautiful.

My husband loves D&G Light Blue but this is one of his new favorites. This is a nice light scent that I like to wear during the day. It's nice because it's not too strong. I have tons of compliments on this scent

I love all my purchases from sephora and this one was no exception. I have received at least one compliment about this scent everyday I wear it. It is a bit heavy so I would recommend minimal spritzing; but the scent lasts for quite some time.
